‚â•‚àëc,i‚ü®(z‚Ä≤)c‚Å¢i(L‚àí1),(WL‚Ä≤)c:‚ü©N‚Å¢Œ∫‚Å¢(WL)‚Å¢(1+œµ1)=2‚Å¢‚ü®ZL‚àí1‚Ä≤,(WL‚Ä≤)‚ä§‚Å¢Y‚ü©2‚Å¢N‚Å¢Œ∫‚Å¢(WL)‚Å¢(1+œµ1)absentsubscriptùëêùëñsubscriptsuperscriptsuperscriptùëß‚Ä≤ùêø1ùëêùëñsubscriptsubscriptsuperscriptùëä‚Ä≤ùêø:ùëêabsentùëÅùúÖsubscriptùëäùêø1subscriptitalic-œµ12superscriptsubscriptùëçùêø1‚Ä≤superscriptsubscriptsuperscriptùëä‚Ä≤ùêøtopùëå2ùëÅùúÖsubscriptùëäùêø1subscriptitalic-œµ1\displaystyle\geq\frac{\sum_{c,i}\left\langle(z^{\prime})^{(L-1)}_{ci},(W^{% \prime}_{L})_{c:}\right\rangle}{N\kappa(W_{L})(1+\epsilon_{1})}=\frac{2\left% \langle Z_{L-1}^{\prime},(W^{\prime}_{L})^{\top}Y\right\rangle}{2N\kappa(W_{L}% )(1+\epsilon_{1})}‚â• divide start_ARG ‚àë start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_c , italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚ü® ( italic_z start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚Ä≤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_L - 1 ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_c italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , ( italic_W start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚Ä≤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_c : end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚ü© end_ARG start_ARG italic_N italic_Œ∫ ( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ( 1 + italic_œµ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) end_ARG = divide start_ARG 2 ‚ü® italic_Z start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚Ä≤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT , ( italic_W start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚Ä≤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ä§ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_Y ‚ü© end_ARG start_ARG 2 italic_N italic_Œ∫ ( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ( 1 + italic_œµ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) end_ARG
=‚à•ZL‚àí1‚Ä≤‚à•F2+‚à•(WL‚Ä≤)‚ä§‚Å¢Y‚à•F2‚àí‚à•ZL‚àí1‚Ä≤‚àí(WL‚Ä≤)‚ä§‚Å¢Y‚à•F22‚Å¢N‚Å¢Œ∫‚Å¢(WL)‚Å¢(1+œµ1).absentsuperscriptsubscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•subscriptsuperscriptùëç‚Ä≤ùêø1ùêπ2superscriptsubscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•superscriptsubscriptsuperscriptùëä‚Ä≤ùêøtopùëåùêπ2superscriptsubscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•subscriptsuperscriptùëç‚Ä≤ùêø1superscriptsubscriptsuperscriptùëä‚Ä≤ùêøtopùëåùêπ22ùëÅùúÖsubscriptùëäùêø1subscriptitalic-œµ1\displaystyle=\frac{\left\lVert Z^{\prime}_{L-1}\right\rVert_{F}^{2}+\left% \lVert(W^{\prime}_{L})^{\top}Y\right\rVert_{F}^{2}-\left\lVert Z^{\prime}_{L-1% }-(W^{\prime}_{L})^{\top}Y\right\rVert_{F}^{2}}{2N\kappa(W_{L})(1+\epsilon_{1}% )}.= divide start_ARG ‚à• italic_Z start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚Ä≤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_F end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + ‚à• ( italic_W start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚Ä≤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ä§ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_Y ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_F end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - ‚à• italic_Z start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚Ä≤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - ( italic_W start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚Ä≤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ä§ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_Y ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_F end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG 2 italic_N italic_Œ∫ ( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ( 1 + italic_œµ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) end_ARG .

Here, the first inequality follows from upper bounding ‚à•(WL‚Ä≤)c:‚à•2subscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•subscriptsubscriptsuperscriptùëä‚Ä≤ùêø:ùëêabsent2\left\lVert(W^{\prime}_{L})_{c:}\right\rVert_{2}‚à• ( italic_W start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚Ä≤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_c : end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT trivially by 1 and

‚à•(z‚Ä≤)c‚Å¢i(L‚àí1)‚à•2‚â§Œ∫‚Å¢(WL)‚Å¢‚à•zc‚Å¢i(L)‚à•2‚â§Œ∫‚Å¢(WL)‚Å¢(‚à•yc‚àízc‚Å¢i(L)‚à•2+‚à•yc‚à•2)‚â§Œ∫‚Å¢(WL)‚Å¢(1+œµ1).subscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•subscriptsuperscriptsuperscriptùëß‚Ä≤ùêø1ùëêùëñ2ùúÖsubscriptùëäùêøsubscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•subscriptsuperscriptùëßùêøùëêùëñ2ùúÖsubscriptùëäùêøsubscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•subscriptùë¶ùëêsubscriptsuperscriptùëßùêøùëêùëñ2subscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•subscriptùë¶ùëê2ùúÖsubscriptùëäùêø1subscriptitalic-œµ1\left\lVert(z^{\prime})^{(L-1)}_{ci}\right\rVert_{2}\leq\kappa(W_{L})\left% \lVert z^{(L)}_{ci}\right\rVert_{2}\leq\kappa(W_{L})\left(\left\lVert y_{c}-z^% {(L)}_{ci}\right\rVert_{2}+\left\lVert y_{c}\right\rVert_{2}\right)\leq\kappa(% W_{L})(1+\epsilon_{1}).‚à• ( italic_z start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚Ä≤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_L - 1 ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_c italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚â§ italic_Œ∫ ( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ‚à• italic_z start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_L ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_c italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚â§ italic_Œ∫ ( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ( ‚à• italic_y start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_c end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - italic_z start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_L ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_c italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + ‚à• italic_y start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_c end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ‚â§ italic_Œ∫ ( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ( 1 + italic_œµ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) .

Now,

‚à•ZL‚àí1‚Ä≤‚à•F2‚â•‚à•ZL‚à•F2‚â•(‚à•Y‚à•F‚àí‚à•ZL‚àíY‚à•F)2=(N‚àíœµ1)2.superscriptsubscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•subscriptsuperscriptùëç‚Ä≤ùêø1ùêπ2superscriptsubscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•subscriptùëçùêøùêπ2superscriptsubscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•ùëåùêπsubscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•subscriptùëçùêøùëåùêπ2superscriptùëÅsubscriptitalic-œµ12\left\lVert Z^{\prime}_{L-1}\right\rVert_{F}^{2}\geq\left\lVert Z_{L}\right% \rVert_{F}^{2}\geq\left(\left\lVert Y\right\rVert_{F}-\left\lVert Z_{L}-Y% \right\rVert_{F}\right)^{2}=(\sqrt{N}-\epsilon_{1})^{2}.‚à• italic_Z start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚Ä≤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_F end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚â• ‚à• italic_Z start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_F end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚â• ( ‚à• italic_Y ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_F end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - ‚à• italic_Z start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - italic_Y ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_F end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT = ( square-root start_ARG italic_N end_ARG - italic_œµ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT .

Furthermore, we readily have that ‚à•(WL‚Ä≤)‚ä§‚Å¢Y‚à•F‚â•NŒ∫‚Å¢(WL).subscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•superscriptsubscriptsuperscriptùëä‚Ä≤ùêøtopùëåùêπùëÅùúÖsubscriptùëäùêø\left\lVert(W^{\prime}_{L})^{\top}Y\right\rVert_{F}\geq\frac{\sqrt{N}}{\kappa(% W_{L})}.‚à• ( italic_W start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚Ä≤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ä§ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_Y ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_F end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚â• divide start_ARG square-root start_ARG italic_N end_ARG end_ARG start_ARG italic_Œ∫ ( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) end_ARG . Finally, we have:

‚à•ZL‚àí1‚Ä≤‚àí(WL‚Ä≤)‚ä§‚Å¢Y‚à•F‚â§‚à•ZL‚àí1‚Ä≤‚àí(WL‚Ä≤)+‚Å¢Y‚à•F+‚à•(WL‚Ä≤)+‚Å¢Y‚àí(WL‚Ä≤)‚ä§‚Å¢Y‚à•F.subscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•subscriptsuperscriptùëç‚Ä≤ùêø1superscriptsuperscriptsubscriptùëäùêø‚Ä≤topùëåùêπsubscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•subscriptsuperscriptùëç‚Ä≤ùêø1superscriptsubscriptsuperscriptùëä‚Ä≤ùêøùëåùêπsubscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•superscriptsubscriptsuperscriptùëä‚Ä≤ùêøùëåsuperscriptsubscriptsuperscriptùëä‚Ä≤ùêøtopùëåùêπ\displaystyle\left\lVert Z^{\prime}_{L-1}-(W_{L}^{\prime})^{\top}Y\right\rVert% _{F}\leq\left\lVert Z^{\prime}_{L-1}-(W^{\prime}_{L})^{+}Y\right\rVert_{F}+% \left\lVert(W^{\prime}_{L})^{+}Y-(W^{\prime}_{L})^{\top}Y\right\rVert_{F}.‚à• italic_Z start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚Ä≤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - ( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚Ä≤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ä§ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_Y ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_F end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚â§ ‚à• italic_Z start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚Ä≤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - ( italic_W start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚Ä≤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_Y ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_F end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + ‚à• ( italic_W start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚Ä≤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_Y - ( italic_W start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚Ä≤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ä§ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_Y ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_F end_POSTSUBSCRIPT .

From (22), we obtain that

‚à•ZL‚àí1‚Ä≤‚àí(WL‚Ä≤)+‚Å¢Y‚à•F‚â§r2‚Å¢(œµ1sK‚Å¢(Y)‚àíœµ1+nL‚àí1‚Å¢œµ2)=r‚Å¢Œ®‚Å¢(œµ1,œµ2,r).subscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•subscriptsuperscriptùëç‚Ä≤ùêø1superscriptsuperscriptsubscriptùëäùêø‚Ä≤ùëåùêπsuperscriptùëü2subscriptitalic-œµ1subscriptùë†ùêæùëåsubscriptitalic-œµ1subscriptùëõùêø1subscriptitalic-œµ2ùëüŒ®subscriptitalic-œµ1subscriptitalic-œµ2ùëü\displaystyle\left\lVert Z^{\prime}_{L-1}-(W_{L}^{\prime})^{+}Y\right\rVert_{F% }\leq r^{2}\left(\frac{\epsilon_{1}}{s_{K}(Y)-\epsilon_{1}}+\sqrt{n_{L-1}% \epsilon_{2}}\right)=r\Psi(\epsilon_{1},\epsilon_{2},r).‚à• italic_Z start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚Ä≤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - ( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚Ä≤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_Y ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_F end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚â§ italic_r start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( divide start_ARG italic_œµ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_K end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_Y ) - italic_œµ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG + square-root start_ARG italic_n start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_œµ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG ) = italic_r roman_Œ® ( italic_œµ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_œµ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_r ) . (23)

Finally, we proceed with upper bounding ‚à•(WL‚Ä≤)+‚Å¢Y‚àí(WL‚Ä≤)‚ä§‚Å¢Y‚à•Fsubscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•superscriptsubscriptsuperscriptùëä‚Ä≤ùêøùëåsuperscriptsubscriptsuperscriptùëä‚Ä≤ùêøtopùëåùêπ\left\lVert(W^{\prime}_{L})^{+}Y-(W^{\prime}_{L})^{\top}Y\right\rVert_{F}‚à• ( italic_W start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚Ä≤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_Y - ( italic_W start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚Ä≤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ä§ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_Y ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_F end_POSTSUBSCRIPT, which can be done via a sandwich bound on the singular values using the conditioning number. This gives

‚à•(WL‚Ä≤)+‚Å¢Y‚àí(WL‚Ä≤)‚ä§‚Å¢Y‚à•F‚â§K‚Å¢(Œ∫‚Å¢(WL)‚àí1Œ∫‚Å¢(WL))‚â§K‚Å¢(Œ∫‚Å¢(WL)2‚àí1).subscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•superscriptsubscriptsuperscriptùëä‚Ä≤ùêøùëåsuperscriptsubscriptsuperscriptùëä‚Ä≤ùêøtopùëåùêπùêæùúÖsubscriptùëäùêø1ùúÖsubscriptùëäùêøùêæùúÖsuperscriptsubscriptùëäùêø21\left\lVert(W^{\prime}_{L})^{+}Y-(W^{\prime}_{L})^{\top}Y\right\rVert_{F}\leq% \sqrt{K}\left(\kappa(W_{L})-\frac{1}{\kappa(W_{L})}\right)\leq\sqrt{K}(\kappa(% W_{L})^{2}-1).‚à• ( italic_W start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚Ä≤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_Y - ( italic_W start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚Ä≤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ä§ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_Y ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_F end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚â§ square-root start_ARG italic_K end_ARG ( italic_Œ∫ ( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) - divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_Œ∫ ( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) end_ARG ) ‚â§ square-root start_ARG italic_K end_ARG ( italic_Œ∫ ( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - 1 ) .

Putting all the obtained bounds together, we get the desired bound (5) on NC3.

Finally, to pass from the bound (3) on Œ∫‚Å¢(WL)ùúÖsubscriptùëäùêø\kappa(W_{L})italic_Œ∫ ( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) to the bound (4) on NC2, we use the inequality in (23) obtained in the proof of NC3. Note that obtaining a bound on Œ∫‚Å¢(Z¬ØL‚àí1‚Ä≤)ùúÖsubscriptsuperscript¬Øùëç‚Ä≤ùêø1\kappa(\bar{Z}^{\prime}_{L-1})italic_Œ∫ ( over¬Ø start_ARG italic_Z end_ARG start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚Ä≤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) is equivalent to obtaining a bound on Œ∫‚Å¢(Z¬ØL‚àí1)ùúÖsubscript¬Øùëçùêø1\kappa(\bar{Z}_{L-1})italic_Œ∫ ( over¬Ø start_ARG italic_Z end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) since multiplying by a scalar does not change the condition number. Using (23) we get:

‚à•Z¬ØL‚àí1‚Ä≤‚àí(WL‚Ä≤)+‚à•Fsubscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•subscriptsuperscript¬Øùëç‚Ä≤ùêø1superscriptsubscriptsuperscriptùëä‚Ä≤ùêøùêπ\displaystyle\left\lVert\bar{Z}^{\prime}_{L-1}-(W^{\prime}_{L})^{+}\right% \rVert_{F}‚à• over¬Ø start_ARG italic_Z end_ARG start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚Ä≤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - ( italic_W start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚Ä≤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_F end_POSTSUBSCRIPT =‚à•ZL‚àí1‚Ä≤‚Å¢Y+‚àí(WL‚Ä≤)+‚Å¢Y‚Å¢Y+‚à•F‚â§‚à•Y+‚à•o‚Å¢p‚Å¢‚à•ZL‚àí1‚Ä≤‚àí(WL‚Ä≤)+‚Å¢Y‚à•Fabsentsubscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•subscriptsuperscriptùëç‚Ä≤ùêø1superscriptùëåsuperscriptsubscriptsuperscriptùëä‚Ä≤ùêøùëåsuperscriptùëåùêπsubscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•superscriptùëåùëúùëùsubscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•subscriptsuperscriptùëç‚Ä≤ùêø1superscriptsubscriptsuperscriptùëä‚Ä≤ùêøùëåùêπ\displaystyle=\left\lVert Z^{\prime}_{L-1}Y^{+}-(W^{\prime}_{L})^{+}YY^{+}% \right\rVert_{F}\leq\left\lVert Y^{+}\right\rVert_{op}\left\lVert Z^{\prime}_{% L-1}-(W^{\prime}_{L})^{+}Y\right\rVert_{F}= ‚à• italic_Z start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚Ä≤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Y start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - ( italic_W start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚Ä≤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_Y italic_Y start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_F end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚â§ ‚à• italic_Y start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_o italic_p end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• italic_Z start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚Ä≤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - ( italic_W start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚Ä≤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_Y ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_F end_POSTSUBSCRIPT
‚â§r‚Å¢Œ®‚Å¢(œµ1,œµ2,r)sK‚Å¢(Y).absentùëüŒ®subscriptitalic-œµ1subscriptitalic-œµ2ùëüsubscriptùë†ùêæùëå\displaystyle\leq\frac{r\Psi(\epsilon_{1},\epsilon_{2},r)}{s_{K}(Y)}.‚â§ divide start_ARG italic_r roman_Œ® ( italic_œµ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_œµ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_r ) end_ARG start_ARG italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_K end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_Y ) end_ARG .

As ‚Äñ(WL‚Ä≤)+‚Äño‚Å¢p=Œ∫‚Å¢(WL)subscriptnormsuperscriptsubscriptsuperscriptùëä‚Ä≤ùêøùëúùëùùúÖsubscriptùëäùêø\|(W^{\prime}_{L})^{+}\|_{op}=\kappa(W_{L})‚à• ( italic_W start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚Ä≤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_o italic_p end_POSTSUBSCRIPT = italic_Œ∫ ( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) and sK‚Å¢((WL‚Ä≤)+)=1subscriptùë†ùêæsuperscriptsubscriptsuperscriptùëä‚Ä≤ùêø1s_{K}((W^{\prime}_{L})^{+})=1italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_K end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( ( italic_W start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚Ä≤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) = 1, we conclude that

Œ∫‚Å¢(Z¬ØL‚àí1‚Ä≤)‚â§Œ∫‚Å¢(WL)+r‚Å¢Œ®‚Å¢(œµ1,œµ2,r)‚Å¢(sK‚Å¢(Y))‚àí11‚àír‚Å¢Œ®‚Å¢(œµ1,œµ2,r)‚Å¢(sK‚Å¢(Y))‚àí1,ùúÖsubscriptsuperscript¬Øùëç‚Ä≤ùêø1ùúÖsubscriptùëäùêøùëüŒ®subscriptitalic-œµ1subscriptitalic-œµ2ùëüsuperscriptsubscriptùë†ùêæùëå11ùëüŒ®subscriptitalic-œµ1subscriptitalic-œµ2ùëüsuperscriptsubscriptùë†ùêæùëå1\kappa(\bar{Z}^{\prime}_{L-1})\leq\frac{\kappa(W_{L})+r\Psi(\epsilon_{1},% \epsilon_{2},r)(s_{K}(Y))^{-1}}{1-r\Psi(\epsilon_{1},\epsilon_{2},r)(s_{K}(Y))% ^{-1}},italic_Œ∫ ( over¬Ø start_ARG italic_Z end_ARG start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚Ä≤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ‚â§ divide start_ARG italic_Œ∫ ( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) + italic_r roman_Œ® ( italic_œµ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_œµ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_r ) ( italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_K end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_Y ) ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG 1 - italic_r roman_Œ® ( italic_œµ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_œµ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_r ) ( italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_K end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_Y ) ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG ,

which gives the desired bound in (4).

‚àé

See 4.5

Proof.

Let Œ∏‚ààB‚Å¢(Œ∏0,r0)ùúÉùêµsubscriptùúÉ0subscriptùëü0\theta\in B(\theta_{0},r_{0})italic_Œ∏ ‚àà italic_B ( italic_Œ∏ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_r start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ). Then, the following chain of inequalities holds:

‚Äñ‚àáC0‚Å¢(Œ∏)+Œª‚Å¢Œ∏‚Äñ22‚â•(‚Äñ‚àáC0‚Å¢(Œ∏)‚Äñ2‚àíŒª‚Å¢‚ÄñŒ∏‚Äñ2)2‚â•(Œ±2‚Å¢C0‚Å¢(Œ∏)‚àíŒª‚Å¢‚ÄñŒ∏‚Äñ2)2=(Œ±2‚Å¢CŒª‚Å¢(Œ∏)‚àíŒ±‚Å¢Œª4‚Å¢‚ÄñŒ∏‚Äñ22‚àíŒª‚Å¢‚ÄñŒ∏‚Äñ2)2‚â•(Œ±2‚Å¢CŒª‚Å¢(Œ∏)‚àí(Œª+Œ±‚Å¢Œª4)‚Å¢‚ÄñŒ∏‚Äñ2)2‚â•Œ±4‚Å¢CŒª‚Å¢(Œ∏)‚àíŒª‚Å¢(Œ±4+Œª)2‚Å¢‚ÄñŒ∏‚Äñ22‚â•Œ±4‚Å¢(CŒª‚Å¢(Œ∏)‚àíŒª‚Å¢(1+4‚Å¢ŒªŒ±)2‚Å¢(‚ÄñŒ∏0‚Äñ2+r0)2).superscriptsubscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•‚àásubscriptùê∂0ùúÉùúÜùúÉ22superscriptsubscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•‚àásubscriptùê∂0ùúÉ2ùúÜsubscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•ùúÉ22superscriptùõº2subscriptùê∂0ùúÉùúÜsubscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•ùúÉ22superscriptùõº2subscriptùê∂ùúÜùúÉùõºùúÜ4superscriptsubscriptnormùúÉ22ùúÜsubscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•ùúÉ22superscriptùõº2subscriptùê∂ùúÜùúÉùúÜùõºùúÜ4subscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•ùúÉ22ùõº4subscriptùê∂ùúÜùúÉùúÜsuperscriptùõº4ùúÜ2superscriptsubscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•ùúÉ22ùõº4subscriptùê∂ùúÜùúÉùúÜsuperscript14ùúÜùõº2superscriptsubscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•subscriptùúÉ02subscriptùëü02\begin{split}\left\|\nabla C_{0}(\theta)+\lambda\theta\right\|_{2}^{2}&\geq% \left(\left\|\nabla C_{0}(\theta)\right\|_{2}-\lambda\left\|\theta\right\|_{2}% \right)^{2}\\ &\geq\left(\sqrt{\frac{\alpha}{2}C_{0}(\theta)}-\lambda\left\|\theta\right\|_{% 2}\right)^{2}\\ &=\left(\sqrt{\frac{\alpha}{2}C_{\lambda}(\theta)-\frac{\alpha\lambda}{4}\left% \|\theta\right\|_{2}^{2}}-\lambda\left\|\theta\right\|_{2}\right)^{2}\\ &\geq\left(\sqrt{\frac{\alpha}{2}C_{\lambda}(\theta)}-\left(\lambda+\sqrt{% \frac{\alpha\lambda}{4}}\right)\left\|\theta\right\|_{2}\right)^{2}\\ &\geq\frac{\alpha}{4}C_{\lambda}(\theta)-\lambda\left(\sqrt{\frac{\alpha}{4}}+% \sqrt{\lambda}\right)^{2}\left\|\theta\right\|_{2}^{2}\\ &\geq\frac{\alpha}{4}\left(C_{\lambda}(\theta)-\lambda\left(1+\sqrt{\frac{4% \lambda}{\alpha}}\right)^{2}\left(\left\|\theta_{0}\right\|_{2}+r_{0}\right)^{% 2}\right).\end{split}start_ROW start_CELL ‚à• ‚àá italic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_Œ∏ ) + italic_Œª italic_Œ∏ ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_CELL start_CELL ‚â• ( ‚à• ‚àá italic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_Œ∏ ) ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - italic_Œª ‚à• italic_Œ∏ ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_CELL end_ROW start_ROW start_CELL end_CELL start_CELL ‚â• ( square-root start_ARG divide start_ARG italic_Œ± end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG italic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_Œ∏ ) end_ARG - italic_Œª ‚à• italic_Œ∏ ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_CELL end_ROW start_ROW start_CELL end_CELL start_CELL = ( square-root start_ARG divide start_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG - italic_Œª ‚à• italic_Œ∏ ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_CELL end_ROW start_ROW start_CELL end_CELL start_CELL ‚â• ( square-root start_ARG divide start_ARG italic_Œ± end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG italic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Œª end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_Œ∏ ) end_ARG - ( italic_Œª + square-root start_ARG divide start_ARG italic_Œ± italic_Œª end_ARG start_ARG 4 end_ARG end_ARG ) ‚à• italic_Œ∏ ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_CELL end_ROW start_ROW start_CELL end_CELL start_CELL ‚â• divide start_ARG italic_Œ± end_ARG start_ARG 4 end_ARG italic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Œª end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_Œ∏ ) - italic_Œª ( square-root start_ARG divide start_ARG italic_Œ± end_ARG start_ARG 4 end_ARG end_ARG + square-root start_ARG italic_Œª end_ARG ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• italic_Œ∏ ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_CELL end_ROW start_ROW start_CELL end_CELL start_CELL ‚â• divide start_ARG italic_Œ± end_ARG start_ARG 4 end_ARG ( italic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Œª end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_Œ∏ ) - italic_Œª ( 1 + square-root start_ARG divide start_ARG 4 italic_Œª end_ARG start_ARG italic_Œ± end_ARG end_ARG ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( ‚à• italic_Œ∏ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_r start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) . end_CELL end_ROW (24)

Here, in the second line we use that Œ±2‚Å¢C0‚Å¢(Œ∏)‚â•Œª‚Å¢‚ÄñŒ∏‚Äñ2ùõº2subscriptùê∂0ùúÉùúÜsubscriptnormùúÉ2\sqrt{\frac{\alpha}{2}C_{0}(\theta)}\geq\lambda\left\|\theta\right\|_{2}square-root start_ARG divide start_ARG italic_Œ± end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG italic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_Œ∏ ) end_ARG ‚â• italic_Œª ‚à• italic_Œ∏ ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT, which follows from CŒª‚Å¢(Œ∏)‚â•Œª‚Å¢mŒªsubscriptùê∂ùúÜùúÉùúÜsubscriptùëöùúÜC_{\lambda}(\theta)\geq\lambda m_{\lambda}italic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Œª end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_Œ∏ ) ‚â• italic_Œª italic_m start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Œª end_POSTSUBSCRIPT (otherwise, the claim is trivial); in the fourth line we use that a‚àíb‚â•a‚àíbùëéùëèùëéùëè\sqrt{a-b}\geq\sqrt{a}-\sqrt{b}square-root start_ARG italic_a - italic_b end_ARG ‚â• square-root start_ARG italic_a end_ARG - square-root start_ARG italic_b end_ARG for a‚â•bùëéùëèa\geq bitalic_a ‚â• italic_b; in the fifth line we use that (a‚àíb)2‚â•a22‚àíb2superscriptùëéùëè2superscriptùëé22superscriptùëè2(a-b)^{2}\geq\frac{a^{2}}{2}-b^{2}( italic_a - italic_b ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚â• divide start_ARG italic_a start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG - italic_b start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT for all a,bùëéùëèa,bitalic_a , italic_b; and in the sixth line we use that Œ∏ùúÉ\thetaitalic_Œ∏ is in the ball B‚Å¢(Œ∏0,r0)ùêµsubscriptùúÉ0subscriptùëü0B(\theta_{0},r_{0})italic_B ( italic_Œ∏ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_r start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ). As the LHS of (24) equals ‚à•‚àáCŒª(Œ∏))‚à•22\left\|\nabla C_{\lambda}(\theta))\right\|_{2}^{2}‚à• ‚àá italic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Œª end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_Œ∏ ) ) ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT, this proves (14).

Next, let (Œ∏k)k‚àà‚ÑïsubscriptsubscriptùúÉùëòùëò‚Ñï(\theta_{k})_{k\in\mathbb{N}}( italic_Œ∏ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_k ‚àà blackboard_N end_POSTSUBSCRIPT be the GD trajectory. Pick kùëòkitalic_k s.t. Œ∏k‚ààB‚Å¢(Œ∏0,r0)subscriptùúÉùëòùêµsubscriptùúÉ0subscriptùëü0\theta_{k}\in B(\theta_{0},r_{0})italic_Œ∏ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚àà italic_B ( italic_Œ∏ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_r start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ). Then,

CŒª‚Å¢(Œ∏k+1)‚àíCŒª‚Å¢(Œ∏k)=‚àíŒ∑‚Å¢‚à´01‚ü®‚àáCŒª‚Å¢(Œ∏k‚àís‚Å¢Œ∑‚Å¢‚àáCŒª‚Å¢(Œ∏k)),‚àáCŒª‚Å¢(Œ∏k)‚ü©‚Å¢ùëëssubscriptùê∂ùúÜsubscriptùúÉùëò1subscriptùê∂ùúÜsubscriptùúÉùëòùúÇsuperscriptsubscript01‚àásubscriptùê∂ùúÜsubscriptùúÉùëòùë†ùúÇ‚àásubscriptùê∂ùúÜsubscriptùúÉùëò‚àásubscriptùê∂ùúÜsubscriptùúÉùëòdifferential-dùë†\displaystyle C_{\lambda}(\theta_{k+1})-C_{\lambda}(\theta_{k})=-\eta\int_{0}^% {1}\langle\nabla C_{\lambda}(\theta_{k}-s\eta\nabla C_{\lambda}(\theta_{k})),% \nabla C_{\lambda}(\theta_{k})\rangle dsitalic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Œª end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_Œ∏ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_k + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) - italic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Œª end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_Œ∏ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) = - italic_Œ∑ ‚à´ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ü® ‚àá italic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Œª end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_Œ∏ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - italic_s italic_Œ∑ ‚àá italic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Œª end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_Œ∏ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ) , ‚àá italic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Œª end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_Œ∏ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ‚ü© italic_d italic_s
=‚àíŒ∑‚Å¢‚Äñ‚àáCŒª‚Å¢(Œ∏k)‚Äñ22+Œ∑‚Å¢‚à´01‚ü®‚àáCŒª‚Å¢(Œ∏k‚àís‚Å¢Œ∑‚Å¢‚àáCŒª‚Å¢(Œ∏k))‚àí‚àáCŒª‚Å¢(Œ∏k),‚àáCŒª‚Å¢(Œ∏k)‚ü©‚Å¢ùëësabsentùúÇsuperscriptsubscriptnorm‚àásubscriptùê∂ùúÜsubscriptùúÉùëò22ùúÇsuperscriptsubscript01‚àásubscriptùê∂ùúÜsubscriptùúÉùëòùë†ùúÇ‚àásubscriptùê∂ùúÜsubscriptùúÉùëò‚àásubscriptùê∂ùúÜsubscriptùúÉùëò‚àásubscriptùê∂ùúÜsubscriptùúÉùëòdifferential-dùë†\displaystyle=-\eta\left\|\nabla C_{\lambda}(\theta_{k})\right\|_{2}^{2}+\eta% \int_{0}^{1}\langle\nabla C_{\lambda}(\theta_{k}-s\eta\nabla C_{\lambda}(% \theta_{k}))-\nabla C_{\lambda}(\theta_{k}),\nabla C_{\lambda}(\theta_{k})% \rangle ds= - italic_Œ∑ ‚à• ‚àá italic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Œª end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_Œ∏ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + italic_Œ∑ ‚à´ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ü® ‚àá italic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Œª end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_Œ∏ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - italic_s italic_Œ∑ ‚àá italic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Œª end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_Œ∏ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ) - ‚àá italic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Œª end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_Œ∏ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) , ‚àá italic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Œª end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_Œ∏ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ‚ü© italic_d italic_s
‚â§‚àíŒ∑‚Å¢‚Äñ‚àáCŒª‚Å¢(Œ∏k)‚Äñ22+Œ∑‚Å¢‚à´01‚Äñ‚àáCŒª‚Å¢(Œ∏k)‚Äñ2‚Å¢‚Äñ‚àáCŒª‚Å¢(Œ∏k‚àís‚Å¢Œ∑‚Å¢‚àáCŒª‚Å¢(Œ∏k))‚àí‚àáCŒª‚Å¢(Œ∏k)‚Äñ2‚Å¢ùëësabsentùúÇsuperscriptsubscriptnorm‚àásubscriptùê∂ùúÜsubscriptùúÉùëò22ùúÇsuperscriptsubscript01subscriptnorm‚àásubscriptùê∂ùúÜsubscriptùúÉùëò2subscriptnorm‚àásubscriptùê∂ùúÜsubscriptùúÉùëòùë†ùúÇ‚àásubscriptùê∂ùúÜsubscriptùúÉùëò‚àásubscriptùê∂ùúÜsubscriptùúÉùëò2differential-dùë†\displaystyle\leq-\eta\left\|\nabla C_{\lambda}(\theta_{k})\right\|_{2}^{2}+% \eta\int_{0}^{1}\left\|\nabla C_{\lambda}(\theta_{k})\right\|_{2}\left\|\nabla C% _{\lambda}(\theta_{k}-s\eta\nabla C_{\lambda}(\theta_{k}))-\nabla C_{\lambda}(% \theta_{k})\right\|_{2}ds‚â§ - italic_Œ∑ ‚à• ‚àá italic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Œª end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_Œ∏ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + italic_Œ∑ ‚à´ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• ‚àá italic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Œª end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_Œ∏ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• ‚àá italic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Œª end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_Œ∏ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - italic_s italic_Œ∑ ‚àá italic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Œª end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_Œ∏ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ) - ‚àá italic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Œª end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_Œ∏ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_d italic_s
‚â§‚àíŒ∑‚Å¢‚Äñ‚àáCŒª‚Å¢(Œ∏k)‚Äñ22+Œ∑2‚Å¢Œ≤1‚Å¢‚Äñ‚àáCŒª‚Å¢(Œ∏k)‚Äñ22absentùúÇsuperscriptsubscriptnorm‚àásubscriptùê∂ùúÜsubscriptùúÉùëò22superscriptùúÇ2subscriptùõΩ1superscriptsubscriptnorm‚àásubscriptùê∂ùúÜsubscriptùúÉùëò22\displaystyle\leq-\eta\left\|\nabla C_{\lambda}(\theta_{k})\right\|_{2}^{2}+% \eta^{2}\beta_{1}\left\|\nabla C_{\lambda}(\theta_{k})\right\|_{2}^{2}‚â§ - italic_Œ∑ ‚à• ‚àá italic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Œª end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_Œ∏ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + italic_Œ∑ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_Œ≤ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• ‚àá italic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Œª end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_Œ∏ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT
=‚àíŒ∑‚Å¢(1‚àíŒ∑‚Å¢Œ≤1)‚Å¢‚Äñ‚àáCŒª‚Å¢(Œ∏k)‚Äñ22absentùúÇ1ùúÇsubscriptùõΩ1superscriptsubscriptnorm‚àásubscriptùê∂ùúÜsubscriptùúÉùëò22\displaystyle=-\eta(1-\eta\beta_{1})\left\|\nabla C_{\lambda}(\theta_{k})% \right\|_{2}^{2}= - italic_Œ∑ ( 1 - italic_Œ∑ italic_Œ≤ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ‚à• ‚àá italic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Œª end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_Œ∏ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT
‚â§‚àíŒ∑2‚Å¢‚Äñ‚àáCŒª‚Å¢(Œ∏k)‚Äñ22absentùúÇ2superscriptsubscriptnorm‚àásubscriptùê∂ùúÜsubscriptùúÉùëò22\displaystyle\leq-\frac{\eta}{2}\left\|\nabla C_{\lambda}(\theta_{k})\right\|_% {2}^{2}‚â§ - divide start_ARG italic_Œ∑ end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG ‚à• ‚àá italic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Œª end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_Œ∏ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT
‚â§‚àíŒ∑‚Å¢Œ±8‚Å¢(CŒª‚Å¢(Œ∏k)‚àíŒª‚Å¢mŒª).absentùúÇùõº8subscriptùê∂ùúÜsubscriptùúÉùëòùúÜsubscriptùëöùúÜ\displaystyle\leq-\eta\frac{\alpha}{8}\left(C_{\lambda}(\theta_{k})-\lambda m_% {\lambda}\right).‚â§ - italic_Œ∑ divide start_ARG italic_Œ± end_ARG start_ARG 8 end_ARG ( italic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Œª end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_Œ∏ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) - italic_Œª italic_m start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Œª end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) .

Here, in the fourth line we use that the gradient is Œ≤1subscriptùõΩ1\beta_{1}italic_Œ≤ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT-Lipschitz in B‚Å¢(Œ∏0,r0)ùêµsubscriptùúÉ0subscriptùëü0B(\theta_{0},r_{0})italic_B ( italic_Œ∏ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_r start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ); in the sixth line we use that Œ∑<1/(2‚Å¢Œ≤1)ùúÇ12subscriptùõΩ1\eta<1/(2\beta_{1})italic_Œ∑ < 1 / ( 2 italic_Œ≤ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ); and in the last line we use (14). Thus, as long as Œ∏j‚ààB‚Å¢(Œ∏0,r0)subscriptùúÉùëóùêµsubscriptùúÉ0subscriptùëü0\theta_{j}\in B(\theta_{0},r_{0})italic_Œ∏ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚àà italic_B ( italic_Œ∏ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_r start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) for all j‚àà[k]ùëódelimited-[]ùëòj\in[k]italic_j ‚àà [ italic_k ], by iterating the argument above, we have

CŒª‚Å¢(Œ∏k)‚àíŒª‚Å¢mŒª‚â§(CŒª‚Å¢(Œ∏0)‚àíŒª‚Å¢mŒª)‚Å¢(1‚àíŒ∑‚Å¢Œ±8)k.subscriptùê∂ùúÜsubscriptùúÉùëòùúÜsubscriptùëöùúÜsubscriptùê∂ùúÜsubscriptùúÉ0ùúÜsubscriptùëöùúÜsuperscript1ùúÇùõº8ùëòC_{\lambda}(\theta_{k})-\lambda m_{\lambda}\leq\left(C_{\lambda}(\theta_{0})-% \lambda m_{\lambda}\right)\left(1-\eta\frac{\alpha}{8}\right)^{k}.italic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Œª end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_Œ∏ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) - italic_Œª italic_m start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Œª end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚â§ ( italic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Œª end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_Œ∏ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) - italic_Œª italic_m start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Œª end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ( 1 - italic_Œ∑ divide start_ARG italic_Œ± end_ARG start_ARG 8 end_ARG ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT .

This readily implies that, by letting k1subscriptùëò1k_{1}italic_k start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT be the first index kùëòkitalic_k s.t. CŒª‚Å¢(Œ∏k)‚â§2‚Å¢Œª‚Å¢mŒªsubscriptùê∂ùúÜsubscriptùúÉùëò2ùúÜsubscriptùëöùúÜC_{\lambda}(\theta_{k})\leq 2\lambda m_{\lambda}italic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Œª end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_Œ∏ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ‚â§ 2 italic_Œª italic_m start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Œª end_POSTSUBSCRIPT, (15) holds. Finally, the distance ‚ÄñŒ∏k1‚àíŒ∏0‚Äñ2subscriptnormsubscriptùúÉsubscriptùëò1subscriptùúÉ02\left\|\theta_{k_{1}}-\theta_{0}\right\|_{2}‚à• italic_Œ∏ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_k start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - italic_Œ∏ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT is upper bounded by

‚àëk=0k1‚àí1Œ∑superscriptsubscriptùëò0subscriptùëò11ùúÇ\displaystyle\sum_{k=0}^{k_{1}-1}\eta‚àë start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_k = 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_Œ∑ ‚Äñ‚àáCŒª‚Å¢(Œ∏k)‚Äñ2=Œ∑‚Å¢‚àëk=0k1‚àí1‚Äñ‚àáCŒª‚Å¢(Œ∏k)‚Äñ22‚Äñ‚àáCŒª‚Å¢(Œ∏k)‚Äñ2subscriptnorm‚àásubscriptùê∂ùúÜsubscriptùúÉùëò2ùúÇsuperscriptsubscriptùëò0subscriptùëò11superscriptsubscriptnorm‚àásubscriptùê∂ùúÜsubscriptùúÉùëò22subscriptnorm‚àásubscriptùê∂ùúÜsubscriptùúÉùëò2\displaystyle\left\|\nabla C_{\lambda}(\theta_{k})\right\|_{2}=\eta\sum_{k=0}^% {k_{1}-1}\frac{\left\|\nabla C_{\lambda}(\theta_{k})\right\|_{2}^{2}}{\left\|% \nabla C_{\lambda}(\theta_{k})\right\|_{2}}‚à• ‚àá italic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Œª end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_Œ∏ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT = italic_Œ∑ ‚àë start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_k = 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG ‚à• ‚àá italic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Œª end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_Œ∏ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG ‚à• ‚àá italic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Œª end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_Œ∏ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG

=8Œ±‚Å¢‚àëk=0k1‚àí2(CŒª‚Å¢(Œ∏k)‚àíŒª‚Å¢mŒª‚àíCŒª‚Å¢(Œ∏k+1)‚àíŒª‚Å¢mŒª)+8Œ±‚Å¢CŒª‚Å¢(Œ∏k1‚àí1)‚àíŒª‚Å¢mŒªabsent8ùõºsuperscriptsubscriptùëò0subscriptùëò12subscriptùê∂ùúÜsubscriptùúÉùëòùúÜsubscriptùëöùúÜsubscriptùê∂ùúÜsubscriptùúÉùëò1ùúÜsubscriptùëöùúÜ8ùõºsubscriptùê∂ùúÜsubscriptùúÉsubscriptùëò11ùúÜsubscriptùëöùúÜ\displaystyle=\frac{8}{\sqrt{\alpha}}\sum_{k=0}^{k_{1}-2}\left(\sqrt{C_{% \lambda}(\theta_{k})-\lambda m_{\lambda}}-\sqrt{C_{\lambda}(\theta_{k+1})-% \lambda m_{\lambda}}\right)+\frac{8}{\sqrt{\alpha}}\sqrt{C_{\lambda}(\theta_{k% _{1}-1})-\lambda m_{\lambda}}= divide start_ARG 8 end_ARG start_ARG square-root start_ARG italic_Œ± end_ARG end_ARG ‚àë start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_k = 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( square-root start_ARG italic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Œª end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_Œ∏ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) - italic_Œª italic_m start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Œª end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG - square-root start_ARG italic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Œª end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_Œ∏ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_k + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) - italic_Œª italic_m start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Œª end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG ) + divide start_ARG 8 end_ARG start_ARG square-root start_ARG italic_Œ± end_ARG end_ARG square-root start_ARG italic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Œª end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_Œ∏ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_k start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) - italic_Œª italic_m start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Œª end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG
=8Œ±‚Å¢CŒª‚Å¢(Œ∏0)‚àíŒª‚Å¢mŒª‚â§8Œ±‚Å¢CŒª‚Å¢(Œ∏0),absent8ùõºsubscriptùê∂ùúÜsubscriptùúÉ0ùúÜsubscriptùëöùúÜ8ùõºsubscriptùê∂ùúÜsubscriptùúÉ0\displaystyle=\frac{8}{\sqrt{\alpha}}\sqrt{C_{\lambda}(\theta_{0})-\lambda m_{% \lambda}}\leq\frac{8}{\sqrt{\alpha}}\sqrt{C_{\lambda}(\theta_{0})},= divide start_ARG 8 end_ARG start_ARG square-root start_ARG italic_Œ± end_ARG end_ARG square-root start_ARG italic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Œª end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_Œ∏ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) - italic_Œª italic_m start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Œª end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG ‚â§ divide start_ARG 8 end_ARG start_ARG square-root start_ARG italic_Œ± end_ARG end_ARG square-root start_ARG italic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Œª end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_Œ∏ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) end_ARG ,

which concludes the proof. ‚àé

See 4.4

Proof.

By Lemma 4.1 in (Nguyen & Mondelli, 2020), the loss C0‚Å¢(Œ∏)subscriptùê∂0ùúÉC_{0}(\theta)italic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_Œ∏ ) satisfies the Œ±ùõº\alphaitalic_Œ±-PL inequality with

where we have also used that œÉ‚Ä≤superscriptùúé‚Ä≤\sigma^{\prime}italic_œÉ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚Ä≤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT is lower bounded by Œ≥ùõæ\gammaitalic_Œ≥ by Assumption 4.2. By using Assumption 4.3 and that ŒªùúÜ\lambdaitalic_Œª is upper bounded by 2‚Å¢C0‚Å¢(Œ∏0)‚à•Œ∏0‚à•222subscriptùê∂0subscriptùúÉ0superscriptsubscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•subscriptùúÉ022\frac{2C_{0}(\theta_{0})}{\left\lVert\theta_{0}\right\rVert_{2}^{2}}divide start_ARG 2 italic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_Œ∏ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) end_ARG start_ARG ‚à• italic_Œ∏ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG in (10), one can readily verify that r0‚â•8‚Å¢CŒª‚Å¢(Œ∏0)/Œ±subscriptùëü08subscriptùê∂ùúÜsubscriptùúÉ0ùõºr_{0}\geq 8\sqrt{C_{\lambda}(\theta_{0})/\alpha}italic_r start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚â• 8 square-root start_ARG italic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Œª end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_Œ∏ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) / italic_Œ± end_ARG. Furthermore, by Lemma C.1, we have that ‚àáC0‚Å¢(Œ∏)‚àásubscriptùê∂0ùúÉ\nabla C_{0}(\theta)‚àá italic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_Œ∏ ) is Œ≤1subscriptùõΩ1\beta_{1}italic_Œ≤ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT-Lipschitz for all Œ∏‚ààB‚Å¢(Œ∏0,r0)ùúÉùêµsubscriptùúÉ0subscriptùëü0\theta\in B(\theta_{0},r_{0})italic_Œ∏ ‚àà italic_B ( italic_Œ∏ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_r start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ). Hence, we can apply Proposition 4.5, which gives that, for some k1subscriptùëò1k_{1}italic_k start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT upper bounded in (15),

CŒª‚Å¢(Œ∏k1)‚â§2‚Å¢Œª‚Å¢mŒª‚â§œµ12,subscriptùê∂ùúÜsubscriptùúÉsubscriptùëò12ùúÜsubscriptùëöùúÜsuperscriptsubscriptitalic-œµ12C_{\lambda}(\theta_{k_{1}})\leq 2\lambda m_{\lambda}\leq\epsilon_{1}^{2},italic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Œª end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_Œ∏ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_k start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ‚â§ 2 italic_Œª italic_m start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Œª end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚â§ italic_œµ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ,

where the last inequality uses again the upper bound on ŒªùúÜ\lambdaitalic_Œª in (10).

With gradient flow, the regularized loss would only decrease further after k1subscriptùëò1k_{1}italic_k start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT steps. Since we are working with gradient descent, we simply need to assume that the learning rate is small enough to guarantee a decreasing loss. If the gradient ‚àáCŒª‚Å¢(Œ∏)‚àásubscriptùê∂ùúÜùúÉ\nabla C_{\lambda}(\theta)‚àá italic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Œª end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_Œ∏ ) is Œ≤2subscriptùõΩ2\beta_{2}italic_Œ≤ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT-Lipschitz, then

CŒª‚Å¢(Œ∏k+1)subscriptùê∂ùúÜsubscriptùúÉùëò1\displaystyle C_{\lambda}(\theta_{k+1})italic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Œª end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_Œ∏ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_k + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ‚àíCŒª‚Å¢(Œ∏k)=CŒª‚Å¢(Œ∏k‚àíŒ∑‚Å¢‚àáCŒª‚Å¢(Œ∏k))‚àíCŒª‚Å¢(Œ∏k)subscriptùê∂ùúÜsubscriptùúÉùëòsubscriptùê∂ùúÜsubscriptùúÉùëòùúÇ‚àásubscriptùê∂ùúÜsubscriptùúÉùëòsubscriptùê∂ùúÜsubscriptùúÉùëò\displaystyle-C_{\lambda}(\theta_{k})=C_{\lambda}(\theta_{k}-\eta\nabla C_{% \lambda}(\theta_{k}))-C_{\lambda}(\theta_{k})- italic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Œª end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_Œ∏ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) = italic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Œª end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_Œ∏ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - italic_Œ∑ ‚àá italic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Œª end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_Œ∏ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ) - italic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Œª end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_Œ∏ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUBSCRIPT )
=‚àíŒ∑‚Å¢‚à´01‚ü®‚àáCŒª‚Å¢(Œ∏k‚àís‚Å¢Œ∑‚Å¢‚àáCŒª‚Å¢(Œ∏k)),‚àáCŒª‚Å¢(Œ∏k)‚ü©‚Å¢ùëësabsentùúÇsuperscriptsubscript01‚àásubscriptùê∂ùúÜsubscriptùúÉùëòùë†ùúÇ‚àásubscriptùê∂ùúÜsubscriptùúÉùëò‚àásubscriptùê∂ùúÜsubscriptùúÉùëòdifferential-dùë†\displaystyle=-\eta\int_{0}^{1}\left\langle\nabla C_{\lambda}(\theta_{k}-s\eta% \nabla C_{\lambda}(\theta_{k})),\nabla C_{\lambda}(\theta_{k})\right\rangle ds= - italic_Œ∑ ‚à´ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ü® ‚àá italic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Œª end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_Œ∏ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - italic_s italic_Œ∑ ‚àá italic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Œª end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_Œ∏ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ) , ‚àá italic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Œª end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_Œ∏ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ‚ü© italic_d italic_s
‚â§‚àíŒ∑‚Å¢‚Äñ‚àáCŒª‚Å¢(Œ∏k)‚Äñ22absentùúÇsuperscriptsubscriptnorm‚àásubscriptùê∂ùúÜsubscriptùúÉùëò22\displaystyle\leq-\eta\left\|\nabla C_{\lambda}(\theta_{k})\right\|_{2}^{2}‚â§ - italic_Œ∑ ‚à• ‚àá italic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Œª end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_Œ∏ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT
+Œ∑‚Å¢‚Äñ‚àáCŒª‚Å¢(Œ∏k)‚Äñ2‚Å¢maxs‚àà[0,1]‚Äñ‚àáCŒª‚Å¢(Œ∏k)‚àí‚àáCŒª‚Å¢(Œ∏k‚àís‚Å¢Œ∑‚Å¢‚àáC‚Å¢(Œ∏k))‚Äñ2ùúÇsubscriptnorm‚àásubscriptùê∂ùúÜsubscriptùúÉùëò2subscriptmaxùë†01subscriptnorm‚àásubscriptùê∂ùúÜsubscriptùúÉùëò‚àásubscriptùê∂ùúÜsubscriptùúÉùëòùë†ùúÇ‚àáùê∂subscriptùúÉùëò2\displaystyle\hskip 11.00008pt+\eta\left\|\nabla C_{\lambda}(\theta_{k})\right% \|_{2}\mathop{\rm max}\nolimits_{s\in[0,1]}\left\|\nabla C_{\lambda}(\theta_{k% })-\nabla C_{\lambda}(\theta_{k}-s\eta\nabla C(\theta_{k}))\right\|_{2}+ italic_Œ∑ ‚à• ‚àá italic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Œª end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_Œ∏ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_max start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_s ‚àà [ 0 , 1 ] end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• ‚àá italic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Œª end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_Œ∏ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) - ‚àá italic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Œª end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_Œ∏ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - italic_s italic_Œ∑ ‚àá italic_C ( italic_Œ∏ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ) ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT
‚â§‚àíŒ∑‚Å¢‚Äñ‚àáCŒª‚Å¢(Œ∏k)‚Äñ22+Œ∑2‚Å¢Œ≤2‚Å¢‚Äñ‚àáCŒª‚Å¢(Œ∏k)‚Äñ22absentùúÇsuperscriptsubscriptnorm‚àásubscriptùê∂ùúÜsubscriptùúÉùëò22superscriptùúÇ2subscriptùõΩ2superscriptsubscriptnorm‚àásubscriptùê∂ùúÜsubscriptùúÉùëò22\displaystyle\leq-\eta\left\|\nabla C_{\lambda}(\theta_{k})\right\|_{2}^{2}+% \eta^{2}\beta_{2}\left\|\nabla C_{\lambda}(\theta_{k})\right\|_{2}^{2}‚â§ - italic_Œ∑ ‚à• ‚àá italic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Œª end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_Œ∏ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + italic_Œ∑ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_Œ≤ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• ‚àá italic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Œª end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_Œ∏ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT
=‚àíŒ∑‚Å¢(1‚àíŒ∑‚Å¢Œ≤2)‚Å¢‚Äñ‚àáCŒª‚Å¢(Œ∏k)‚Äñ22,absentùúÇ1ùúÇsubscriptùõΩ2subscriptsuperscriptnorm‚àásubscriptùê∂ùúÜsubscriptùúÉùëò22\displaystyle=-\eta(1-\eta\beta_{2})\left\|\nabla C_{\lambda}(\theta_{k})% \right\|^{2}_{2},= - italic_Œ∑ ( 1 - italic_Œ∑ italic_Œ≤ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ‚à• ‚àá italic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Œª end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_Œ∏ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ‚à• start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ,

which is non-positive as long as Œ∑‚â§1/Œ≤2ùúÇ1subscriptùõΩ2\eta\leq 1/\beta_{2}italic_Œ∑ ‚â§ 1 / italic_Œ≤ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT. Furthermore, as long as the regularized loss is decreasing, the parameter norm is bounded by œµ1‚Å¢2/Œªsubscriptitalic-œµ12ùúÜ\epsilon_{1}\sqrt{2/\lambda}italic_œµ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT square-root start_ARG 2 / italic_Œª end_ARG. Lemma C.1 then implies that the gradient is Œ≤2=5‚Å¢N‚Å¢Œ≤‚Å¢b3‚Å¢max(1,œµ13‚Å¢L‚Å¢(2Œª)3‚Å¢L/2)‚Å¢L5/2subscriptùõΩ25ùëÅùõΩsuperscriptùëè3max1superscriptsubscriptitalic-œµ13ùêøsuperscript2ùúÜ3ùêø2superscriptùêø52\beta_{2}=5N\beta b^{3}\mathop{\rm max}\nolimits\left(1,\epsilon_{1}^{3L}\left% (\frac{2}{\lambda}\right)^{3L/2}\right)L^{5/2}italic_Œ≤ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT = 5 italic_N italic_Œ≤ italic_b start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 3 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT roman_max ( 1 , italic_œµ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 3 italic_L end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( divide start_ARG 2 end_ARG start_ARG italic_Œª end_ARG ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 3 italic_L / 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) italic_L start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 5 / 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT-Lipschitz and, therefore, Œ∑‚â§1/Œ≤2ùúÇ1subscriptùõΩ2\eta\leq 1/\beta_{2}italic_Œ∑ ‚â§ 1 / italic_Œ≤ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT holds by (10). This allows us to conclude that, for all kùëòkitalic_k satisfying the lower bound in (10), CŒª‚Å¢(Œ∏k)‚â§œµ12subscriptùê∂ùúÜsubscriptùúÉùëòsuperscriptsubscriptitalic-œµ12C_{\lambda}(\theta_{k})\leq\epsilon_{1}^{2}italic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Œª end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_Œ∏ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ‚â§ italic_œµ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT, hence the network achieves approximate interpolation, i.e.,

‚ÄñZLk‚àíY‚ÄñF‚â§œµ1‚Å¢2.subscriptnormsuperscriptsubscriptùëçùêøùëòùëåùêπsubscriptitalic-œµ12\|Z_{L}^{k}-Y\|_{F}\leq\epsilon_{1}\sqrt{2}.‚à• italic_Z start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - italic_Y ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_F end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚â§ italic_œµ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT square-root start_ARG 2 end_ARG . (25)

Next, we show approximate balancedness. To do so, for ‚Ñì‚àà{L1+2,‚Ä¶,L‚àí1}‚Ñìsubscriptùêø12‚Ä¶ùêø1\ell\in\{L_{1}+2,\ldots,L-1\}roman_‚Ñì ‚àà { italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 2 , ‚Ä¶ , italic_L - 1 }, we define

T‚Ñìk:=(W‚Ñì+1k)‚ä§‚Å¢‚ãØ‚Å¢(WLk)‚ä§‚Å¢(ZLk‚àíY)‚Å¢(ZL1k)‚ä§‚Å¢(WL1+1k)‚ä§‚Å¢‚ãØ‚Å¢(W‚Ñì‚àí1k)‚ä§.assignsuperscriptsubscriptùëá‚Ñìùëòsuperscriptsuperscriptsubscriptùëä‚Ñì1ùëòtop‚ãØsuperscriptsuperscriptsubscriptùëäùêøùëòtopsuperscriptsubscriptùëçùêøùëòùëåsuperscriptsuperscriptsubscriptùëçsubscriptùêø1ùëòtopsuperscriptsuperscriptsubscriptùëäsubscriptùêø11ùëòtop‚ãØsuperscriptsuperscriptsubscriptùëä‚Ñì1ùëòtopT_{\ell}^{k}:=(W_{\ell+1}^{k})^{\top}\cdots(W_{L}^{k})^{\top}(Z_{L}^{k}-Y)(Z_{% L_{1}}^{k})^{\top}(W_{L_{1}+1}^{k})^{\top}\cdots(W_{\ell-1}^{k})^{\top}.italic_T start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT := ( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ä§ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãØ ( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ä§ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_Z start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - italic_Y ) ( italic_Z start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ä§ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ä§ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãØ ( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ä§ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT .

Then, we have

W‚Ñìk+1superscriptsubscriptùëä‚Ñìùëò1\displaystyle W_{\ell}^{k+1}italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k + 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT (W‚Ñìk+1)‚ä§=((1‚àíŒ∑‚Å¢Œª)‚Å¢W‚Ñìk‚àíŒ∑‚Å¢T‚Ñìk)‚Å¢((1‚àíŒ∑‚Å¢Œª)‚Å¢W‚Ñìk‚àíŒ∑‚Å¢T‚Ñìk)‚ä§superscriptsuperscriptsubscriptùëä‚Ñìùëò1top1ùúÇùúÜsuperscriptsubscriptùëä‚ÑìùëòùúÇsuperscriptsubscriptùëá‚Ñìùëòsuperscript1ùúÇùúÜsuperscriptsubscriptùëä‚ÑìùëòùúÇsuperscriptsubscriptùëá‚Ñìùëòtop\displaystyle(W_{\ell}^{k+1})^{\top}=((1-\eta\lambda)W_{\ell}^{k}-\eta T_{\ell% }^{k})((1-\eta\lambda)W_{\ell}^{k}-\eta T_{\ell}^{k})^{\top}( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k + 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ä§ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT = ( ( 1 - italic_Œ∑ italic_Œª ) italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - italic_Œ∑ italic_T start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) ( ( 1 - italic_Œ∑ italic_Œª ) italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - italic_Œ∑ italic_T start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ä§ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT
=(1‚àíŒ∑‚Å¢Œª)2‚Å¢W‚Ñìk‚Å¢(W‚Ñìk)‚ä§‚àí(1‚àíŒ∑‚Å¢Œª)‚Å¢Œ∑‚Å¢(W‚Ñìk‚Å¢(T‚Ñìk)‚ä§+T‚Ñìk‚Å¢(W‚Ñìk)‚ä§)+Œ∑2‚Å¢T‚Ñìk‚Å¢(T‚Ñìk)‚ä§.absentsuperscript1ùúÇùúÜ2superscriptsubscriptùëä‚Ñìùëòsuperscriptsuperscriptsubscriptùëä‚Ñìùëòtop1ùúÇùúÜùúÇsuperscriptsubscriptùëä‚Ñìùëòsuperscriptsuperscriptsubscriptùëá‚Ñìùëòtopsuperscriptsubscriptùëá‚Ñìùëòsuperscriptsuperscriptsubscriptùëä‚ÑìùëòtopsuperscriptùúÇ2superscriptsubscriptùëá‚Ñìùëòsuperscriptsuperscriptsubscriptùëá‚Ñìùëòtop\displaystyle=(1-\eta\lambda)^{2}W_{\ell}^{k}(W_{\ell}^{k})^{\top}-(1-\eta% \lambda)\eta(W_{\ell}^{k}(T_{\ell}^{k})^{\top}+T_{\ell}^{k}(W_{\ell}^{k})^{% \top})+\eta^{2}T_{\ell}^{k}(T_{\ell}^{k})^{\top}.= ( 1 - italic_Œ∑ italic_Œª ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ä§ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - ( 1 - italic_Œ∑ italic_Œª ) italic_Œ∑ ( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_T start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ä§ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + italic_T start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ä§ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) + italic_Œ∑ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_T start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_T start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ä§ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT .

Similarly,

(W‚Ñì+1k+1)‚ä§‚Å¢W‚Ñì+1k+1superscriptsuperscriptsubscriptùëä‚Ñì1ùëò1topsuperscriptsubscriptùëä‚Ñì1ùëò1\displaystyle(W_{\ell+1}^{k+1})^{\top}W_{\ell+1}^{k+1}( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k + 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ä§ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k + 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT
=(1‚àíŒ∑‚Å¢Œª)2‚Å¢(W‚Ñì+1k)‚ä§‚Å¢W‚Ñì+1k‚àí(1‚àíŒ∑‚Å¢Œª)‚Å¢Œ∑‚Å¢((W‚Ñì+1k)‚ä§‚Å¢T‚Ñì+1k+(T‚Ñì+1k)‚ä§‚Å¢W‚Ñì+1k)+Œ∑2‚Å¢(T‚Ñì+1k)‚ä§‚Å¢T‚Ñì+1k.absentsuperscript1ùúÇùúÜ2superscriptsuperscriptsubscriptùëä‚Ñì1ùëòtopsuperscriptsubscriptùëä‚Ñì1ùëò1ùúÇùúÜùúÇsuperscriptsuperscriptsubscriptùëä‚Ñì1ùëòtopsuperscriptsubscriptùëá‚Ñì1ùëòsuperscriptsuperscriptsubscriptùëá‚Ñì1ùëòtopsuperscriptsubscriptùëä‚Ñì1ùëòsuperscriptùúÇ2superscriptsuperscriptsubscriptùëá‚Ñì1ùëòtopsuperscriptsubscriptùëá‚Ñì1ùëò\displaystyle=(1-\eta\lambda)^{2}(W_{\ell+1}^{k})^{\top}W_{\ell+1}^{k}-(1-\eta% \lambda)\eta((W_{\ell+1}^{k})^{\top}T_{\ell+1}^{k}+(T_{\ell+1}^{k})^{\top}W_{% \ell+1}^{k})+\eta^{2}(T_{\ell+1}^{k})^{\top}T_{\ell+1}^{k}.= ( 1 - Let us define

D‚Ñìk=(W‚Ñì+1k)‚ä§‚Å¢W‚Ñì+1k‚àíW‚Ñìk‚Å¢(W‚Ñìk)‚ä§.superscriptsubscriptùê∑‚Ñìùëòsuperscriptsuperscriptsubscriptùëä‚Ñì1ùëòtopsuperscriptsubscriptùëä‚Ñì1ùëòsuperscriptsubscriptùëä‚Ñìùëòsuperscriptsuperscriptsubscriptùëä‚ÑìùëòtopD_{\ell}^{k}=(W_{\ell+1}^{k})^{\top}W_{\ell+1}^{k}-W_{\ell}^{k}(W_{\ell}^{k})^% {\top}.italic_D start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT = ( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ä§ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ä§ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT .

Since T‚Ñìk‚Å¢(W‚Ñìk)‚ä§=(W‚Ñì+1k)‚ä§‚Å¢T‚Ñì+1ksuperscriptsubscriptùëá‚Ñìùëòsuperscriptsuperscriptsubscriptùëä‚Ñìùëòtopsuperscriptsuperscriptsubscriptùëä‚Ñì1ùëòtopsuperscriptsubscriptùëá‚Ñì1ùëòT_{\ell}^{k}(W_{\ell}^{k})^{\top}=(W_{\ell+1}^{k})^{\top}T_{\ell+1}^{k}italic_T start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ä§ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT = ( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ä§ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_T start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT and W‚Ñìk‚Å¢(T‚Ñìk)‚ä§=(T‚Ñì+1k)‚ä§‚Å¢W‚Ñì+1ksuperscriptsubscriptùëä‚Ñìùëòsuperscriptsuperscriptsubscriptùëá‚Ñìùëòtopsuperscriptsuperscriptsubscriptùëá‚Ñì1ùëòtopsuperscriptsubscriptùëä‚Ñì1ùëòW_{\ell}^{k}(T_{\ell}^{k})^{\top}=(T_{\ell+1}^{k})^{\top}W_{\ell+1}^{k}italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_T start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ä§ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT = ( italic_T start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ä§ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT, we have

D‚Ñìk+1=(1‚àíŒ∑‚Å¢Œª)2‚Å¢D‚Ñìk+Œ∑2‚Å¢((T‚Ñì+1k)‚ä§‚Å¢T‚Ñì+1k‚àíT‚Ñìk‚Å¢(T‚Ñìk)‚ä§).superscriptsubscriptùê∑‚Ñìùëò1superscript1ùúÇùúÜ2superscriptsubscriptùê∑‚ÑìùëòsuperscriptùúÇ2superscriptsuperscriptsubscriptùëá‚Ñì1ùëòtopsuperscriptsubscriptùëá‚Ñì1ùëòsuperscriptsubscriptùëá‚Ñìùëòsuperscriptsuperscriptsubscriptùëá‚Ñìùëòtop\displaystyle D_{\ell}^{k+1}=(1-\eta\lambda)^{2}D_{\ell}^{k}+\eta^{2}((T_{\ell% +1}^{k})^{\top}T_{\ell+1}^{k}-T_{\ell}^{k}(T_{\ell}^{k})^{\top}).italic_D start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k + 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT = ( 1 - italic_Œ∑ italic_Œª ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_D start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + italic_Œ∑ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( ( italic_T start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ä§ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_T start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - italic_T start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_T start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ä§ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) .

Recall that, for all kùëòkitalic_k lower bounded in (10), ‚ÄñZLk‚àíY‚ÄñF‚â§œµ1‚Å¢2subscriptnormsuperscriptsubscriptùëçùêøùëòùëåùêπsubscriptitalic-œµ12\|Z_{L}^{k}-Y\|_{F}\leq\epsilon_{1}\sqrt{2}‚à• italic_Z start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - italic_Y ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_F end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚â§ italic_œµ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT square-root start_ARG 2 end_ARG and ‚ÄñW‚Ñìk‚ÄñF‚â§‚ÄñŒ∏k‚Äñ2‚â§œµ1‚Å¢2/Œªsubscriptnormsuperscriptsubscriptùëä‚ÑìùëòùêπsubscriptnormsuperscriptùúÉùëò2subscriptitalic-œµ12ùúÜ\|W_{\ell}^{k}\|_{F}\leq\|\theta^{k}\|_{2}\leq\epsilon_{1}\sqrt{2/\lambda}‚à• italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_F end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚â§ ‚à• italic_Œ∏ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚â§ italic_œµ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT square-root start_ARG 2 / italic_Œª end_ARG, which also implies that ‚ÄñZL1‚ÄñF‚â§(œµ1‚Å¢2/Œª)L1‚Å¢‚ÄñX‚Äño‚Å¢psubscriptnormsubscriptùëçsubscriptùêø1ùêπsuperscriptsubscriptitalic-œµ12ùúÜsubscriptùêø1subscriptnormùëãùëúùëù\|Z_{L_{1}}\|_{F}\leq\left(\epsilon_{1}\sqrt{2/\lambda}\right)^{L_{1}}\|X\|_{op}‚à• italic_Z start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_F end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚â§ ( italic_œµ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT square-root start_ARG 2 / italic_Œª end_ARG ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• italic_X ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_o italic_p end_POSTSUBSCRIPT. Thus,

‚ÄñD‚Ñìk+1‚Äño‚Å¢psubscriptnormsuperscriptsubscriptùê∑‚Ñìùëò1ùëúùëù\displaystyle\|D_{\ell}^{k+1}\|_{op}‚à• italic_D start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k + 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_o italic_p end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚â§(1‚àíŒ∑‚Å¢Œª)2‚Å¢‚ÄñD‚Ñìk‚Äño‚Å¢p+Œ∑2‚Å¢(‚ÄñT‚Ñìk‚Äño‚Å¢p2+‚ÄñT‚Ñì+1k‚Äño‚Å¢p2)absentsuperscript1ùúÇùúÜ2subscriptnormsuperscriptsubscriptùê∑‚ÑìùëòùëúùëùsuperscriptùúÇ2superscriptsubscriptnormsuperscriptsubscriptùëá‚Ñìùëòùëúùëù2superscriptsubscriptnormsuperscriptsubscriptùëá‚Ñì1ùëòùëúùëù2\displaystyle\leq(1-\eta\lambda)^{2}\|D_{\ell}^{k}\|_{op}+\eta^{2}(\|T_{\ell}^% {k}\|_{op}^{2}+\|T_{\ell+1}^{k}\|_{op}^{2})‚â§ ( 1 - italic_Œ∑ italic_Œª ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• italic_D start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_o italic_p end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_Œ∑ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( ‚à• italic_T start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_o italic_p end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + ‚à• italic_T start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_o italic_p end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT )
‚â§(1‚àíŒ∑‚Å¢Œª)2‚Å¢‚ÄñD‚Ñìk‚Äño‚Å¢p+Œ∑2‚Å¢‚ÄñZL1k‚Äño‚Å¢p2‚Å¢‚ÄñZLk‚àíY‚Äño‚Å¢p2‚Å¢(‚àèj‚â†‚Ñì‚ÄñWjk‚Äño‚Å¢p2+‚àèj‚â†‚Ñì+1‚ÄñWjk‚Äño‚Å¢p2)absentsuperscript1ùúÇùúÜ2subscriptnormsuperscriptsubscriptùê∑‚ÑìùëòùëúùëùsuperscriptùúÇ2superscriptsubscriptnormsuperscriptsubscriptùëçsubscriptùêø1ùëòùëúùëù2superscriptsubscriptnormsuperscriptsubscriptùëçùêøùëòùëåùëúùëù2subscriptproductùëó‚Ñìsuperscriptsubscriptnormsuperscriptsubscriptùëäùëóùëòùëúùëù2subscriptproductùëó‚Ñì1superscriptsubscriptnormsuperscriptsubscriptùëäùëóùëòùëúùëù2\displaystyle\leq(1-\eta\lambda)^{2}\|D_{\ell}^{k}\|_{op}+\eta^{2}\|Z_{L_{1}}^% {k}\|_{op}^{2}\|Z_{L}^{k}-Y\|_{op}^{2}(\prod_{j\neq\ell}\|W_{j}^{k}\|_{op}^{2}% +\prod_{j\neq\ell+1}\|W_{j}^{k}\|_{op}^{2})‚â§ ( 1 -
