‚â§(1‚àíŒ∑‚Å¢Œª)2‚Å¢‚ÄñD‚Ñìk‚Äño‚Å¢p+4‚Å¢Œ∑2‚Å¢œµ12‚Å¢(2‚Å¢œµ12Œª)L1+L‚àí1‚Å¢‚ÄñX‚Äño‚Å¢p2.absentsuperscript1ùúÇùúÜ2subscriptnormsuperscriptsubscriptùê∑‚Ñìùëòùëúùëù4superscriptùúÇ2superscriptsubscriptitalic-œµ12superscript2superscriptsubscriptitalic-œµ12ùúÜsubscriptùêø1ùêø1superscriptsubscriptnormùëãùëúùëù2\displaystyle\leq(1-\eta\lambda)^{2}\|D_{\ell}^{k}\|_{op}+4\eta^{2}\epsilon_{1% }^{2}\left(\frac{2\epsilon_{1}^{2}}{\lambda}\right)^{L_{1}+L-1}\|X\|_{op}^{2}.‚â§ ( 1 - italic_Œ∑ italic_Œª ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• italic_D start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_o italic_p end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 4 italic_Œ∑ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_œµ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( divide start_ARG 2 italic_œµ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_Œª end_ARG ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_L - 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• italic_X ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_o italic_p end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT .

By using the upper bounds Œ∑‚â§12‚Å¢ŒªùúÇ12ùúÜ\eta\leq\frac{1}{2\lambda}italic_Œ∑ ‚â§ divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG 2 italic_Œª end_ARG and Œ∑‚â§(Œª2‚Å¢œµ12)L1+L‚Å¢œµ24‚Å¢‚ÄñX‚Äño‚Å¢p2ùúÇsuperscriptùúÜ2superscriptsubscriptitalic-œµ12subscriptùêø1ùêøsubscriptitalic-œµ24superscriptsubscriptnormùëãùëúùëù2\eta\leq\left(\frac{\lambda}{2\epsilon_{1}^{2}}\right)^{L_{1}+L}\frac{\epsilon% _{2}}{4\|X\|_{op}^{2}}italic_Œ∑ ‚â§ ( divide start_ARG italic_Œª end_ARG start_ARG 2 italic_œµ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_L end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG italic_œµ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG 4 ‚à• italic_X ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_o italic_p end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG in (10), we have that:

  • ‚Ä¢

    if ‚ÄñD‚Ñìk‚Äño‚Å¢p‚â•œµ2subscriptnormsuperscriptsubscriptùê∑‚Ñìùëòùëúùëùsubscriptitalic-œµ2\|D_{\ell}^{k}\|_{op}\geq\epsilon_{2}‚à• italic_D start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_o italic_p end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚â• italic_œµ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT, then ‚ÄñD‚Ñìk+1‚Äño‚Å¢p‚â§(1‚àíŒ∑‚Å¢Œª)‚Å¢‚ÄñD‚Ñìk‚Äño‚Å¢psubscriptnormsuperscriptsubscriptùê∑‚Ñìùëò1ùëúùëù1ùúÇùúÜsubscriptnormsuperscriptsubscriptùê∑‚Ñìùëòùëúùëù\|D_{\ell}^{k+1}\|_{op}\leq(1-\eta\lambda)\|D_{\ell}^{k}\|_{op}‚à• italic_D start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k + 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_o italic_p end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚â§ ( 1 - italic_Œ∑ italic_Œª ) ‚à• italic_D start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_o italic_p end_POSTSUBSCRIPT;

  • ‚Ä¢

    if ‚ÄñD‚Ñìk‚Äño‚Å¢p‚â§œµ2subscriptnormsuperscriptsubscriptùê∑‚Ñìùëòùëúùëùsubscriptitalic-œµ2\|D_{\ell}^{k}\|_{op}\leq\epsilon_{2}‚à• italic_D start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_o italic_p end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚â§ italic_œµ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT, then ‚ÄñD‚Ñìk+1‚Äño‚Å¢p‚â§(1‚àíŒ∑‚Å¢Œª)‚Å¢œµ2‚â§œµ2subscriptnormsuperscriptsubscriptùê∑‚Ñìùëò1ùëúùëù1ùúÇùúÜsubscriptitalic-œµ2subscriptitalic-œµ2\|D_{\ell}^{k+1}\|_{op}\leq(1-\eta\lambda)\epsilon_{2}\leq\epsilon_{2}‚à• italic_D start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k + 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_o italic_p end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚â§ ( 1 - italic_Œ∑ italic_Œª ) italic_œµ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚â§ italic_œµ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT.

This implies that, for all k¬Ø‚â•0¬Øùëò0\bar{k}\geq 0over¬Ø start_ARG italic_k end_ARG ‚â• 0 and k1‚â•‚åàlog‚Å°Œª‚Å¢mŒªCŒª‚Å¢(Œ∏0)‚àíŒª‚Å¢mŒªlog‚Å°(1‚àíŒ∑‚Å¢Œ±8)‚åâsubscriptùëò1ùúÜsubscriptùëöùúÜsubscriptùê∂ùúÜsubscriptùúÉ0ùúÜsubscriptùëöùúÜ1ùúÇùõº8k_{1}\geq\left\lceil\frac{\log\frac{\lambda m_{\lambda}}{C_{\lambda}(\theta_{0% })-\lambda m_{\lambda}}}{\log(1-\eta\frac{\alpha}{8})}\right\rceilitalic_k start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚â• ‚åà divide start_ARG roman_log divide start_ARG italic_Œª italic_m start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Œª end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Œª end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_Œ∏ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) - italic_Œª italic_m start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Œª end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG end_ARG start_ARG roman_log ( 1 - italic_Œ∑ divide start_ARG italic_Œ± end_ARG start_ARG 8 end_ARG ) end_ARG ‚åâ,

‚ÄñD‚Ñìk1+k¬Ø‚Äño‚Å¢p‚â§max((1‚àíŒ∑‚Å¢Œª)k¬Ø‚Å¢‚ÄñD‚Ñìk1‚Äño‚Å¢p,œµ2).subscriptnormsuperscriptsubscriptùê∑‚Ñìsubscriptùëò1¬Øùëòùëúùëùmaxsuperscript1ùúÇùúÜ¬Øùëòsubscriptnormsuperscriptsubscriptùê∑‚Ñìsubscriptùëò1ùëúùëùsubscriptitalic-œµ2\|D_{\ell}^{k_{1}+\bar{k}}\|_{op}\leq\mathop{\rm max}\nolimits((1-\eta\lambda)% ^{\bar{k}}\|D_{\ell}^{k_{1}}\|_{op},\epsilon_{2}).‚à• italic_D start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + over¬Ø start_ARG italic_k end_ARG end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_o italic_p end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚â§ roman_max ( ( 1 - italic_Œ∑ italic_Œª ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT over¬Ø start_ARG italic_k end_ARG end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• italic_D start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_o italic_p end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_œµ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) .

Note that

‚ÄñD‚Ñìk1‚Äño‚Å¢p‚â§‚ÄñW‚Ñì+1k1‚Äño‚Å¢p2+‚ÄñW‚Ñìk1‚Äño‚Å¢p2‚â§4‚Å¢œµ12Œª,subscriptnormsuperscriptsubscriptùê∑‚Ñìsubscriptùëò1ùëúùëùsuperscriptsubscriptnormsuperscriptsubscriptùëä‚Ñì1subscriptùëò1ùëúùëù2superscriptsubscriptnormsuperscriptsubscriptùëä‚Ñìsubscriptùëò1ùëúùëù24superscriptsubscriptitalic-œµ12ùúÜ\|D_{\ell}^{k_{1}}\|_{op}\leq\|W_{\ell+1}^{k_{1}}\|_{op}^{2}+\|W_{\ell}^{k_{1}% }\|_{op}^{2}\leq\frac{4\epsilon_{1}^{2}}{\lambda},‚à• italic_D start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_o italic_p end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚â§ ‚à• italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_o italic_p end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + ‚à• italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_o italic_p end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚â§ divide start_ARG 4 italic_œµ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_Œª end_ARG ,

which allows us to conclude that, for all kùëòkitalic_k lower bounded in (10),

‚ÄñD‚Ñìk‚Äñ2‚â§œµ2.subscriptnormsuperscriptsubscriptùê∑‚Ñìùëò2subscriptitalic-œµ2\|D_{\ell}^{k}\|_{2}\leq\epsilon_{2}.‚à• italic_D start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚â§ italic_œµ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT .

Finally, we have the following bounds on the representations and weights at step kùëòkitalic_k:

‚ÄñZL‚àí2k‚Äño‚Å¢psubscriptnormsuperscriptsubscriptùëçùêø2ùëòùëúùëù\displaystyle\left\|Z_{L-2}^{k}\right\|_{op}‚à• italic_Z start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L - 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_o italic_p end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚â§(œµ1‚Å¢2Œª)L‚àí2‚Å¢‚ÄñX‚Äño‚Å¢p,absentsuperscriptsubscriptitalic-œµ12ùúÜùêø2subscriptnormùëãùëúùëù\displaystyle\leq\left(\epsilon_{1}\sqrt{\frac{2}{\lambda}}\right)^{L-2}\|X\|_% {op},‚â§ ( italic_œµ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT square-root start_ARG divide start_ARG 2 end_ARG start_ARG italic_Œª end_ARG end_ARG ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L - 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• italic_X ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_o italic_p end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ,
‚ÄñZL‚àí1k‚Äño‚Å¢psubscriptnormsuperscriptsubscriptùëçùêø1ùëòùëúùëù\displaystyle\left\|Z_{L-1}^{k}\right\|_{op}‚à• italic_Z start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_o italic_p end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚â§(œµ1‚Å¢2Œª)L‚àí1‚Å¢‚ÄñX‚Äño‚Å¢p,absentsuperscriptsubscriptitalic-œµ12ùúÜùêø1subscriptnormùëãùëúùëù\displaystyle\leq\left(\epsilon_{1}\sqrt{\frac{2}{\lambda}}\right)^{L-1}\|X\|_% {op},‚â§ ( italic_œµ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT square-root start_ARG divide start_ARG 2 end_ARG start_ARG italic_Œª end_ARG end_ARG ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L - 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• italic_X ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_o italic_p end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ,
‚ÄñW‚Ñìk‚Äño‚Å¢psubscriptnormsuperscriptsubscriptùëä‚Ñìùëòùëúùëù\displaystyle\left\|W_{\ell}^{k}\right\|_{op}‚à• italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_o italic_p end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚â§œµ1‚Å¢2Œª, for ‚Å¢‚Ñì‚àà{L1+1,‚Ä¶,L}.formulae-sequenceabsentsubscriptitalic-œµ12ùúÜ for ‚Ñìsubscriptùêø11‚Ä¶ùêø\displaystyle\leq\epsilon_{1}\sqrt{\frac{2}{\lambda}},\,\,\,\mbox{ for }\ell% \in\{L_{1}+1,\ldots,L\}.‚â§ italic_œµ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT square-root start_ARG divide start_ARG 2 end_ARG start_ARG italic_Œª end_ARG end_ARG , for roman_‚Ñì ‚àà { italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 , ‚Ä¶ , italic_L } .

Hence, an application of Theorem 3.1 proves the desired result. ‚àé

See 5.1

Proof.

Let us split the parameter norm into the contribution from the nonlinear and linear layers:

‚ÄñŒ∏‚Äñ22=‚ÄñŒ∏n‚Å¢o‚Å¢n‚Å¢l‚Å¢i‚Å¢n‚Äñ22+‚ÄñŒ∏l‚Å¢i‚Å¢n‚Äñ22.superscriptsubscriptnormùúÉ22superscriptsubscriptnormsubscriptùúÉùëõùëúùëõùëôùëñùëõ22superscriptsubscriptnormsubscriptùúÉùëôùëñùëõ22\left\|\theta\right\|_{2}^{2}=\left\|\theta_{nonlin}\right\|_{2}^{2}+\left\|% \theta_{lin}\right\|_{2}^{2}.‚à• italic_Œ∏ ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT = ‚à• italic_Œ∏ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_n italic_o italic_n italic_l italic_i italic_n end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + ‚à• italic_Œ∏ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_l italic_i italic_n end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT .

We first lower bound both parts in terms of the product of the linear part WL:L1+1subscriptùëä:ùêøsubscriptùêø11W_{L:L_{1}+1}italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L : italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT. This then allows us to bound the conditioning of WL:L1+1subscriptùëä:ùêøsubscriptùêø11W_{L:L_{1}+1}italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L : italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT. We start with the nonlinear part:

‚ÄñZL1‚ÄñF‚â§‚ÄñX‚Äño‚Å¢p‚Å¢‚àè‚Ñì=1L1‚ÄñW‚Ñì‚ÄñF‚â§‚ÄñX‚Äño‚Å¢p‚Å¢(1L1‚Å¢‚ÄñŒ∏n‚Å¢o‚Å¢n‚Å¢l‚Å¢i‚Å¢n‚Äñ22)L12,subscriptnormsubscriptùëçsubscriptùêø1ùêπsubscriptnormùëãùëúùëùsuperscriptsubscriptproduct‚Ñì1subscriptùêø1subscriptnormsubscriptùëä‚Ñìùêπsubscriptnormùëãùëúùëùsuperscript1subscriptùêø1superscriptsubscriptnormsubscriptùúÉùëõùëúùëõùëôùëñùëõ22subscriptùêø12\left\|Z_{L_{1}}\right\|_{F}\leq\left\|X\right\|_{op}\prod_{\ell=1}^{L_{1}}% \left\|W_{\ell}\right\|_{F}\leq\left\|X\right\|_{op}\left(\frac{1}{L_{1}}\left% \|\theta_{nonlin}\right\|_{2}^{2}\right)^{\frac{L_{1}}{2}},‚à• italic_Z start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_F end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚â§ ‚à• italic_X ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_o italic_p end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚àè start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_F end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚â§ ‚à• italic_X ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_o italic_p end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG ‚à• italic_Œ∏ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_n italic_o italic_n italic_l italic_i italic_n end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ,

which implies that

‚ÄñŒ∏n‚Å¢o‚Å¢n‚Å¢l‚Å¢i‚Å¢n‚Äñ22‚â•L1‚Å¢(‚ÄñZL1‚ÄñF‚ÄñX‚Äño‚Å¢p)2L1‚â•L1‚Å¢(‚ÄñZL1‚Äño‚Å¢p‚ÄñX‚Äño‚Å¢p)2L1.superscriptsubscriptnormsubscriptùúÉùëõùëúùëõùëôùëñùëõ22subscriptùêø1superscriptsubscriptnormsubscriptùëçsubscriptùêø1ùêπsubscriptnormùëãùëúùëù2subscriptùêø1subscriptùêø1superscriptsubscriptnormsubscriptùëçsubscriptùêø1ùëúùëùsubscriptnormùëãùëúùëù2subscriptùêø1\left\|\theta_{nonlin}\right\|_{2}^{2}\geq L_{1}\left(\frac{\left\|Z_{L_{1}}% \right\|_{F}}{\left\|X\right\|_{op}}\right)^{\frac{2}{L_{1}}}\geq L_{1}\left(% \frac{\left\|Z_{L_{1}}\right\|_{op}}{\left\|X\right\|_{op}}\right)^{\frac{2}{L% _{1}}}.‚à• italic_Œ∏ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_n italic_o italic_n italic_l italic_i italic_n end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚â• italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( divide start_ARG ‚à• italic_Z start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_F end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG ‚à• italic_X ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_o italic_p end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG 2 end_ARG start_ARG italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚â• italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( divide start_ARG ‚à• italic_Z start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_o italic_p end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG ‚à• italic_X ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_o italic_p end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG 2 end_ARG start_ARG italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT .

Since ‚ÄñY‚àíWL:L1+1‚Å¢ZL1‚ÄñF‚â§œµ1subscriptnormùëåsubscriptùëä:ùêøsubscriptùêø11subscriptùëçsubscriptùêø1ùêπsubscriptitalic-œµ1\left\|Y-W_{L:L_{1}+1}Z_{L_{1}}\right\|_{F}\leq\epsilon_{1}‚à• italic_Y - italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L : italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Z start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_F end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚â§ italic_œµ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT, we have

sK‚Å¢(Y)‚â§sK‚Å¢(WL:L1+1‚Å¢ZL1)+œµ1‚â§sK‚Å¢(WL:L1+1)‚Å¢‚ÄñZL1‚Äño‚Å¢p+œµ1,subscriptùë†ùêæùëåsubscriptùë†ùêæsubscriptùëä:ùêøsubscriptùêø11subscriptùëçsubscriptùêø1subscriptitalic-œµ1subscriptùë†ùêæsubscriptùëä:ùêøsubscriptùêø11subscriptnormsubscriptùëçsubscriptùêø1ùëúùëùsubscriptitalic-œµ1s_{K}(Y)\leq s_{K}(W_{L:L_{1}+1}Z_{L_{1}})+\epsilon_{1}\leq s_{K}(W_{L:L_{1}+1% })\left\|Z_{L_{1}}\right\|_{op}+\epsilon_{1},italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_K end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_Y ) ‚â§ italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_K end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L : italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Z start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) + italic_œµ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚â§ italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_K end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L : italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ‚à• italic_Z start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_o italic_p end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_œµ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ,

so that ‚ÄñZL1‚Äño‚Å¢p‚â•sK‚Å¢(Y)‚àíœµ1sK‚Å¢(WL:L1+1)subscriptnormsubscriptùëçsubscriptùêø1ùëúùëùsubscriptùë†ùêæùëåsubscriptitalic-œµ1subscriptùë†ùêæsubscriptùëä:ùêøsubscriptùêø11\left\|Z_{L_{1}}\right\|_{op}\geq\frac{s_{K}(Y)-\epsilon_{1}}{s_{K}(W_{L:L_{1}% +1})}‚à• italic_Z start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_o italic_p end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚â• divide start_ARG italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_K end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_Y ) - italic_œµ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_K end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L : italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) end_ARG and thus

‚ÄñŒ∏n‚Å¢o‚Å¢n‚Å¢l‚Å¢i‚Å¢n‚Äñ22‚â•L1‚Å¢(sK‚Å¢(Y)‚àíœµ1sK‚Å¢(WL:L1+1)‚Å¢‚ÄñX‚Äño‚Å¢p)2L1.superscriptsubscriptnormsubscriptùúÉùëõùëúùëõùëôùëñùëõ22subscriptùêø1superscriptsubscriptùë†ùêæùëåsubscriptitalic-œµ1subscriptùë†ùêæsubscriptùëä:ùêøsubscriptùêø11subscriptnormùëãùëúùëù2subscriptùêø1\left\|\theta_{nonlin}\right\|_{2}^{2}\geq L_{1}\left(\frac{s_{K}(Y)-\epsilon_% {1}}{s_{K}(W_{L:L_{1}+1})\left\|X\right\|_{op}}\right)^{\frac{2}{L_{1}}}.‚à• italic_Œ∏ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_n italic_o italic_n italic_l italic_i italic_n end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚â• italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( divide start_ARG italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_K end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_Y ) - italic_œµ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_K end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L : italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ‚à• italic_X ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_o italic_p end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG 2 end_ARG start_ARG italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT . (26)

Next, for the linear part, we know from Theorem 1 of Dai et al. (2021) that

min(W‚Ñì)‚Ñì=L1+1L:A=WL:L1+1‚àë‚Ñì=L1+1L‚ÄñW‚Ñì‚ÄñF2=(L‚àíL1)‚Å¢‚àëi=1Rank‚Å¢(A)si‚Å¢(A)2L‚àíL1,subscriptmin:superscriptsubscriptsubscriptùëä‚Ñì‚Ñìsubscriptùêø11ùêøùê¥subscriptùëä:ùêøsubscriptùêø11superscriptsubscript‚Ñìsubscriptùêø11ùêøsuperscriptsubscriptnormsubscriptùëä‚Ñìùêπ2ùêøsubscriptùêø1superscriptsubscriptùëñ1Rankùê¥subscriptùë†ùëñsuperscriptùê¥2ùêøsubscriptùêø1\mathop{\rm min}\nolimits_{(W_{\ell})_{\ell=L_{1}+1}^{L}:A=W_{L:L_{1}+1}}\sum_% {\ell=L_{1}+1}^{L}\|W_{\ell}\|_{F}^{2}=(L-L_{1})\sum_{i=1}^{\mathrm{Rank}(A)}s% _{i}(A)^{\frac{2}{L-L_{1}}},roman_min start_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì = italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT : italic_A = italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L : italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚àë start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì = italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_F end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT = ( italic_L - italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ‚àë start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT roman_Rank ( italic_A ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_A ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG 2 end_ARG start_ARG italic_L - italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ,

so that

‚ÄñŒ∏l‚Å¢i‚Å¢n‚Äñ22‚â•(L‚àíL1)‚Å¢‚àëi=1Rank‚Å¢(WL:L1+1)si‚Å¢(WL:L1+1)2L‚àíL1‚â•(L‚àíL1)‚Å¢K+2‚Å¢log‚Å°|WL:L1+1|+,superscriptsubscriptnormsubscriptùúÉùëôùëñùëõ22ùêøsubscriptùêø1superscriptsubscriptùëñ1Ranksubscriptùëä:ùêøsubscriptùêø11subscriptùë†ùëñsuperscriptsubscriptùëä:ùêøsubscriptùêø112ùêøsubscriptùêø1ùêøsubscriptùêø1ùêæ2subscriptsubscriptùëä:ùêøsubscriptùêø11\left\|\theta_{lin}\right\|_{2}^{2}\geq(L-L_{1})\sum_{i=1}^{\mathrm{Rank}(W_{L% :L_{1}+1})}s_{i}(W_{L:L_{1}+1})^{\frac{2}{L-L_{1}}}\geq(L-L_{1})K+2\log\left|W% _{L:L_{1}+1}\right|_{+},‚à• italic_Œ∏ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_l italic_i italic_n end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚â• ( italic_L - italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ‚àë start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT roman_Rank ( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L : italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L : italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG 2 end_ARG start_ARG italic_L - italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚â• ( italic_L - italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) italic_K + 2 roman_log | italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L : italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT | start_POSTSUBSCRIPT + end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , (27)

where we used the fact that x2L‚àíL1‚â•1+2L‚àíL1‚Å¢log‚Å°xsuperscriptùë•2ùêøsubscriptùêø112ùêøsubscriptùêø1ùë•x^{\frac{2}{L-L_{1}}}\geq 1+\frac{2}{L-L_{1}}\log xitalic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG 2 end_ARG start_ARG italic_L - italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚â• 1 + divide start_ARG 2 end_ARG start_ARG italic_L - italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG roman_log italic_x.

We also have following bound on the condition number Œ∫‚Å¢(WL:L1+1)ùúÖsubscriptùëä:ùêøsubscriptùêø11\kappa(W_{L:L_{1}+1})italic_Œ∫ ( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L : italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ):

Œ∫‚Å¢(WL:L1+1)=s1‚Å¢(WL:L1+1)sK‚Å¢(WL:L1+1)‚â§‚àèi=1Ksi‚Å¢(WL:L1+1)sK‚Å¢(WL:L1+1)=|WL:L1+1|+sK‚Å¢(WL:L1+1)K.ùúÖsubscriptùëä:ùêøsubscriptùêø11subscriptùë†1subscriptùëä:ùêøsubscriptùêø11subscriptùë†ùêæsubscriptùëä:ùêøsubscriptùêø11superscriptsubscriptproductùëñ1ùêæsubscriptùë†ùëñsubscriptùëä:ùêøsubscriptùêø11subscriptùë†ùêæsubscriptùëä:ùêøsubscriptùêø11subscriptsubscriptùëä:ùêøsubscriptùêø11subscriptùë†ùêæsuperscriptsubscriptùëä:ùêøsubscriptùêø11ùêæ\kappa(W_{L:L_{1}+1})=\frac{s_{1}(W_{L:L_{1}+1})}{s_{K}(W_{L:L_{1}+1})}\leq% \prod_{i=1}^{K}\frac{s_{i}(W_{L:L_{1}+1})}{s_{K}(W_{L:L_{1}+1})}=\frac{\left|W% _{L:L_{1}+1}\right|_{+}}{s_{K}(W_{L:L_{1}+1})^{K}}.italic_Œ∫ ( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L : italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) = divide start_ARG italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L : italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) end_ARG start_ARG italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_K end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L : italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) end_ARG ‚â§ ‚àè start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_K end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L : italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) end_ARG start_ARG italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_K end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L : italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) end_ARG = divide start_ARG | italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L : italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT | start_POSTSUBSCRIPT + end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_K end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L : italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_K end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG . (28)

By combining (26), (27), and (28) (after applying the log on both sides of (28)), we obtain

‚ÄñŒ∏‚Äñ22superscriptsubscriptnormùúÉ22\displaystyle\left\|\theta\right\|_{2}^{2}‚à• italic_Œ∏ ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚â•L1‚Å¢(sK‚Å¢(Y)‚àíœµ1sK‚Å¢(WL:L1+1)‚Å¢‚ÄñX‚Äño‚Å¢p)2L1+(L‚àíL1)‚Å¢K+2‚Å¢log‚Å°|WL:L1+1|+absentsubscriptùêø1superscriptsubscriptùë†ùêæùëåsubscriptitalic-œµ1subscriptùë†ùêæsubscriptùëä:ùêøsubscriptùêø11subscriptnormùëãùëúùëù2subscriptùêø1ùêøsubscriptùêø1ùêæ2subscriptsubscriptùëä:ùêøsubscriptùêø11\displaystyle\geq L_{1}\left(\frac{s_{K}(Y)-\epsilon_{1}}{s_{K}(W_{L:L_{1}+1})% \left\|X\right\|_{op}}\right)^{\frac{2}{L_{1}}}+(L-L_{1})K+2\log\left|W_{L:L_{% 1}+1}\right|_{+}‚â• italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( divide start_ARG italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_K end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_Y ) - italic_œµ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_K end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L : italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ‚à• italic_X ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_o italic_p end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG 2 end_ARG start_ARG italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + ( italic_L - italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) italic_K + 2 roman_log | italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L : italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT | start_POSTSUBSCRIPT + end_POSTSUBSCRIPT
‚â•L1‚Å¢(sK‚Å¢(Y)‚àíœµ1sK‚Å¢(WL:L1+1)‚Å¢‚ÄñX‚Äño‚Å¢p)2L1+(L‚àíL1)‚Å¢K+2‚Å¢log‚Å°Œ∫‚Å¢(WL:L1+1)+2‚Å¢K‚Å¢log‚Å°sK‚Å¢(WL:L1+1).absentsubscriptùêø1superscriptsubscriptùë†ùêæùëåsubscriptitalic-œµ1subscriptùë†ùêæsubscriptùëä:ùêøsubscriptùêø11subscriptnormùëãùëúùëù2subscriptùêø1ùêøsubscriptùêø1ùêæ2ùúÖsubscriptùëä:ùêøsubscriptùêø112ùêæsubscriptùë†ùêæsubscriptùëä:ùêøsubscriptùêø11\displaystyle\geq L_{1}\left(\frac{s_{K}(Y)-\epsilon_{1}}{s_{K}(W_{L:L_{1}+1})% \left\|X\right\|_{op}}\right)^{\frac{2}{L_{1}}}+(L-L_{1})K+2\log\kappa(W_{L:L_% {1}+1})+2K\log s_{K}(W_{L:L_{1}+1}).‚â• italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( divide start_ARG italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_K end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_Y ) - italic_œµ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_K end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L : italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ‚à• italic_X ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_o italic_p end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG 2 end_ARG start_ARG italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + ( italic_L - italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) italic_K + 2 roman_log italic_Œ∫ ( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L : italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) + 2 italic_K roman_log italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_K end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L : italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) .

The above is lower bounded by the minimum over all possible choices of sK‚Å¢(WL:L1+1)subscriptùë†ùêæsubscriptùëä:ùêøsubscriptùêø11s_{K}(W_{L:L_{1}+1})italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_K end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L : italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ). This minimum would be attained at sK‚Å¢(WL:L1+1)=K‚àíL12‚Å¢sK‚Å¢(Y)‚àíœµ1‚ÄñX‚Äño‚Å¢psubscriptùë†ùêæsubscriptùëä:ùêøsubscriptùêø11superscriptùêæsubscriptùêø12subscriptùë†ùêæùëåsubscriptitalic-œµ1subscriptnormùëãùëúùëùs_{K}(W_{L:L_{1}+1})=K^{-\frac{L_{1}}{2}}\frac{s_{K}(Y)-\epsilon_{1}}{\left\|X% \right\|_{op}}italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_K end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L : italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) = italic_K start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - divide start_ARG italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_K end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_Y ) - italic_œµ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG ‚à• italic_X ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_o italic_p end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG, thus leading to the lower bound

‚ÄñŒ∏‚Äñ22‚â•L‚Å¢K+2‚Å¢log‚Å°Œ∫‚Å¢(WL:L1+1)‚àíL1‚Å¢K‚Å¢log‚Å°K+2‚Å¢K‚Å¢log‚Å°sK‚Å¢(Y)‚àíœµ1‚ÄñX‚Äño‚Å¢p.superscriptsubscriptnormùúÉ22ùêøùêæ2ùúÖsubscriptùëä:ùêøsubscriptùêø11subscriptùêø1ùêæùêæ2ùêæsubscriptùë†ùêæùëåsubscriptitalic-œµ1subscriptnormùëãùëúùëù\left\|\theta\right\|_{2}^{2}\geq LK+2\log\kappa(W_{L:L_{1}+1})-L_{1}K\log K+2% K\log\frac{s_{K}(Y)-\epsilon_{1}}{\left\|X\right\|_{op}}.‚à• italic_Œ∏ ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚â• italic_L italic_K + 2 roman_log italic_Œ∫ ( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L : italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) - italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_K roman_log italic_K + 2 italic_K roman_log divide start_ARG italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_K end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_Y ) - italic_œµ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG ‚à• italic_X ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_o italic_p end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG .

This implies

2‚Å¢log‚Å°Œ∫‚Å¢(WL:L1+1)2ùúÖsubscriptùëä:ùêøsubscriptùêø11\displaystyle 2\log\kappa(W_{L:L_{1}+1})2 roman_log italic_Œ∫ ( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L : italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ‚â§‚ÄñŒ∏‚Äñ22‚àíL‚Å¢K+L1‚Å¢K‚Å¢log‚Å°K‚àí2‚Å¢K‚Å¢log‚Å°sK‚Å¢(Y)‚àíœµ1‚ÄñX‚Äño‚Å¢pabsentsuperscriptsubscriptnormùúÉ22ùêøùêæsubscriptùêø1ùêæùêæ2ùêæsubscriptùë†ùêæùëåsubscriptitalic-œµ1subscriptnormùëãùëúùëù\displaystyle\leq\left\|\theta\right\|_{2}^{2}-LK+L_{1}K\log K-2K\log\frac{s_{% K}(Y)-\epsilon_{1}}{\left\|X\right\|_{op}}‚â§ ‚à• italic_Œ∏ ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - italic_L italic_K + italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_K roman_log italic_K - 2 italic_K roman_log divide start_ARG italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_K end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_Y ) - italic_œµ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG ‚à• italic_X ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_o italic_p end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG
‚â§c+L1‚Å¢K‚Å¢log‚Å°K‚àí2‚Å¢K‚Å¢log‚Å°sK‚Å¢(Y)‚àíœµ1‚ÄñX‚Äño‚Å¢p.absentùëêsubscriptùêø1ùêæùêæ2ùêæsubscriptùë†ùêæùëåsubscriptitalic-œµ1subscriptnormùëãùëúùëù\displaystyle\leq c+L_{1}K\log K-2K\log\frac{s_{K}(Y)-\epsilon_{1}}{\left\|X% \right\|_{op}}.‚â§ italic_c + italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_K roman_log italic_K - 2 italic_K roman_log divide start_ARG italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_K end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_Y ) - italic_œµ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG ‚à• italic_X ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_o italic_p end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG .

‚àé

See 5.2

Proof.

By assumption, there are parameters of the nonlinear part Œ∏n‚Å¢o‚Å¢n‚Å¢l‚Å¢i‚Å¢nsubscriptùúÉùëõùëúùëõùëôùëñùëõ\theta_{nonlin}italic_Œ∏ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_n italic_o italic_n italic_l italic_i italic_n end_POSTSUBSCRIPT such that the representation at the end of the nonlinear layers already matches the outputs ZL1=Ysubscriptùëçsubscriptùêø1ùëåZ_{L_{1}}=Yitalic_Z start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT = italic_Y with finite parameter norm ‚ÄñŒ∏n‚Å¢o‚Å¢n‚Å¢l‚Å¢i‚Å¢n‚Äñ22=csuperscriptsubscriptnormsubscriptùúÉùëõùëúùëõùëôùëñùëõ22ùëê\left\|\theta_{nonlin}\right\|_{2}^{2}=c‚à• italic_Œ∏ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_n italic_o italic_n italic_l italic_i italic_n end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT = italic_c. We can now build a deeper network by simply setting all the linear layers to be the KùêæKitalic_K-dimensional identity, so that ‚ÄñŒ∏l‚Å¢i‚Å¢n‚Äñ22=K‚Å¢L2superscriptsubscriptnormsubscriptùúÉùëôùëñùëõ22ùêæsubscriptùêø2\left\|\theta_{lin}\right\|_{2}^{2}=KL_{2}‚à• italic_Œ∏ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_l italic_i italic_n end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT = italic_K italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT, leading to a total parameter norm of ‚ÄñŒ∏‚Äñ22=c+K‚Å¢L2superscriptsubscriptnormùúÉ22ùëêùêæsubscriptùêø2\left\|\theta\right\|_{2}^{2}=c+KL_{2}‚à• italic_Œ∏ ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT = italic_c + italic_K italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT. Since the outputs matches the labels exactly, we have that the regularized loss is bounded by Œª‚Å¢(K‚Å¢L2+c)/2ùúÜùêæsubscriptùêø2ùëê2\lambda(KL_{2}+c)/2italic_Œª ( italic_K italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_c ) / 2. This implies that any global minimizer Œ∏‚àósuperscriptùúÉ\theta^{*}italic_Œ∏ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚àó end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT satisfies

‚ÄñY‚àíZL‚ÄñF2subscriptsuperscriptnormùëåsubscriptùëçùêø2ùêπ\displaystyle\left\|Y-Z_{L}\right\|^{2}_{F}‚à• italic_Y - italic_Z start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_F end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚â§Œª‚Å¢(K‚Å¢L2+c),absentùúÜùêæsubscriptùêø2ùëê\displaystyle\leq\lambda(KL_{2}+c),‚â§ italic_Œª ( italic_K italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_c ) ,
‚ÄñŒ∏‚àó‚Äñ22superscriptsubscriptnormsuperscriptùúÉ22\displaystyle\left\|\theta^{*}\right\|_{2}^{2}‚à• italic_Œ∏ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚àó end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚â§K‚Å¢L2+c.absentùêæsubscriptùêø2ùëê\displaystyle\leq KL_{2}+c.‚â§ italic_K italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_c .

Choosing Œª‚â§œµ12K‚Å¢L2+cùúÜsuperscriptsubscriptitalic-œµ12ùêæsubscriptùêø2ùëê\lambda\leq\frac{\epsilon_{1}^{2}}{KL_{2}+c}italic_Œª ‚â§ divide start_ARG italic_œµ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_K italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_c end_ARG, we obtain that the global minimizer Œ∏‚àósuperscriptùúÉ\theta^{*}italic_Œ∏ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚àó end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT must satisfy the assumptions of Proposition 5.1, which readily gives the desired upper bound on Œ∫‚Å¢(WL:L1+1)ùúÖsubscriptùëä:ùêøsubscriptùêø11\kappa(W_{L:L_{1}+1})italic_Œ∫ ( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L : italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ).

To finish the proof, we show that all critical points of the regularized loss have balanced linear layers, so that we may relate the conditioning of WLsubscriptùëäùêøW_{L}italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUBSCRIPT to that of the product WL:L1+1subscriptùëä:ùêøsubscriptùêø11W_{L:L_{1}+1}italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L : italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT. At any critical point, the gradient w.r.t. to any weight matrix amongst the linear layers must be zero, that is

0=‚àáW‚ÑìCŒª‚Å¢(Œ∏)=WL:‚Ñì+1‚ä§‚Å¢(ZL‚àíY)‚Å¢ZL1‚ä§‚Å¢W‚Ñì‚àí1:L1+1‚ä§+Œª‚Å¢W‚Ñì.0subscript‚àásubscriptùëä‚Ñìsubscriptùê∂ùúÜùúÉsuperscriptsubscriptùëä:ùêø‚Ñì1topsubscriptùëçùêøùëåsuperscriptsubscriptùëçsubscriptùêø1topsuperscriptsubscriptùëä:‚Ñì1subscriptùêø11topùúÜsubscriptùëä‚Ñì0=\nabla_{W_{\ell}}C_{\lambda}(\theta)=W_{L:\ell+1}^{\top}(Z_{L}-Y)Z_{L_{1}}^{% \top}W_{\ell-1:L_{1}+1}^{\top}+\lambda W_{\ell}.0 = ‚àá start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Œª end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_Œ∏ ) = italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L : roman_‚Ñì + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ä§ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_Z start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - italic_Y ) italic_Z start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ä§ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì - 1 : italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ä§ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + italic_Œª italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì end_POSTSUBSCRIPT .

This implies that W‚Ñì=‚àí1Œª‚Å¢WL:‚Ñì+1‚ä§‚Å¢(ZL‚àíY)‚Å¢ZL1‚ä§‚Å¢W‚Ñì‚àí1:L1+1‚ä§subscriptùëä‚Ñì1ùúÜsuperscriptsubscriptùëä:ùêø‚Ñì1topsubscriptùëçùêøùëåsuperscriptsubscriptùëçsubscriptùêø1topsuperscriptsubscriptùëä:‚Ñì1subscriptùêø11topW_{\ell}=-\frac{1}{\lambda}W_{L:\ell+1}^{\top}(Z_{L}-Y)Z_{L_{1}}^{\top}W_{\ell% -1:L_{1}+1}^{\top}italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì end_POSTSUBSCRIPT = - divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_Œª end_ARG italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L : roman_‚Ñì + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ä§ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_Z start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - italic_Y ) italic_Z start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ä§ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì - 1 : italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ä§ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT for all linear layers ‚Ñì‚Ñì\ellroman_‚Ñì. Balancedness then follows directly

W‚Ñì‚Å¢W‚Ñì‚ä§=‚àí1Œª‚Å¢WL:‚Ñì+1‚ä§‚Å¢(ZL‚àíY)‚Å¢ZL1‚ä§‚Å¢W‚Ñì:L1+1‚ä§=W‚Ñì+1‚ä§‚Å¢W‚Ñì+1.subscriptùëä‚Ñìsuperscriptsubscriptùëä‚Ñìtop1ùúÜsuperscriptsubscriptùëä:ùêø‚Ñì1topsubscriptùëçùêøùëåsuperscriptsubscriptùëçsubscriptùêø1topsuperscriptsubscriptùëä:‚Ñìsubscriptùêø11topsuperscriptsubscriptùëä‚Ñì1topsubscriptùëä‚Ñì1W_{\ell}W_{\ell}^{\top}=-\frac{1}{\lambda}W_{L:\ell+1}^{\top}(Z_{L}-Y)Z_{L_{1}% }^{\top}W_{\ell:L_{1}+1}^{\top}=W_{\ell+1}^{\top}W_{\ell+1}.italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ä§ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT = - divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_Œª end_ARG italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L : roman_‚Ñì + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ä§ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_Z start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - italic_Y ) italic_Z start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ä§ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì : italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ä§ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT = italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ä§ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT .

Finally, the balancedness implies that

Œ∫‚Å¢(WL)=Œ∫‚Å¢(WL:L1+1)1L1‚â§(‚ÄñX‚Äño‚Å¢psK‚Å¢(Y)‚àíœµ1)KL1‚Å¢exp‚Å°(12‚Å¢L1‚Å¢(c‚àíL1‚Å¢K+L1‚Å¢K‚Å¢log‚Å°K)).ùúÖsubscriptùëäùêøùúÖsuperscriptsubscriptùëä:ùêøsubscriptùêø111subscriptùêø1superscriptsubscriptnormùëãùëúùëùsubscriptùë†ùêæùëåsubscriptitalic-œµ1ùêæsubscriptùêø112subscriptùêø1ùëêsubscriptùêø1ùêæsubscriptùêø1ùêæùêæ\kappa(W_{L})=\kappa(W_{L:L_{1}+1})^{\frac{1}{L_{1}}}\leq\left(\frac{\left\|X% \right\|_{op}}{s_{K}(Y)-\epsilon_{1}}\right)^{\frac{K}{L_{1}}}\exp\left(\frac{% 1}{2L_{1}}\left(c-L_{1}K+L_{1}K\log K\right)\right).italic_Œ∫ ( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) = italic_Œ∫ ( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L : italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚â§ ( divide start_ARG ‚à• italic_X ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_o italic_p end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_K end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_Y ) - italic_œµ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG italic_K end_ARG start_ARG italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT roman_exp ( divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG 2 italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG ( italic_c - italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_K + italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_K roman_log italic_K ) ) .

‚àé

See 5.3

Proof.

As the NTK is a sum over all layers, we can lower bound it by the contribution of the linear layers only. Formally, we have

‚Äñ‚àáŒ∏Tr‚Å¢[ZL‚Å¢A‚ä§]‚Äñ22superscriptsubscriptnormsubscript‚àáùúÉTrdelimited-[]subscriptùëçùêøsuperscriptùê¥top22\displaystyle\left\|\nabla_{\theta}\mathrm{Tr}[Z_{L}A^{\top}]\right\|_{2}^{2}‚à• ‚àá start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Œ∏ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_Tr [ italic_Z start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_A start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ä§ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ] ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚â•‚Äñ‚àáŒ∏l‚Å¢i‚Å¢nTr‚Å¢[ZL‚Å¢A‚ä§]‚Äñ22absentsuperscriptsubscriptnormsubscript‚àásubscriptùúÉùëôùëñùëõTrdelimited-[]subscriptùëçùêøsuperscriptùê¥top22\displaystyle\geq\left\|\nabla_{\theta_{lin}}\mathrm{Tr}[Z_{L}A^{\top}]\right% \|_{2}^{2}‚â• ‚à• ‚àá start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Œ∏ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_l italic_i italic_n end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_Tr [ italic_Z start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_A start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ä§ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ] ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT
=‚àë‚Ñì=L1+1L‚ÄñW‚Ñì‚àí1:L1+1‚Å¢ZL1‚Å¢A‚ä§‚Å¢WL:‚Ñì+1‚ÄñF2absentsuperscriptsubscript‚Ñìsubscriptùêø11ùêøsuperscriptsubscriptnormsubscriptùëä:‚Ñì1subscriptùêø11subscriptùëçsubscriptùêø1superscriptùê¥topsubscriptùëä:ùêø‚Ñì1ùêπ2\displaystyle=\sum_{\ell=L_{1}+1}^{L}\left\|W_{\ell-1:L_{1}+1}Z_{L_{1}}A^{\top% }W_{L:\ell+1}\right\|_{F}^{2}= ‚àë start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì = italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì - 1 : italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Z start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_A start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ä§ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L : roman_‚Ñì + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_F end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT

Let v1,‚Ä¶,vK‚àà‚ÑùNsubscriptùë£1‚Ä¶subscriptùë£ùêæsuperscript‚ÑùùëÅv_{1},\dots,v_{K}\in\mathbb{R}^{N}italic_v start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , ‚Ä¶ , italic_v start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_K end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚àà blackboard_R start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_N end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT be KùêæKitalic_K orthonormal vectors that span the preimage of ZLsubscriptùëçùêøZ_{L}italic_Z start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUBSCRIPT (ZLsubscriptùëçùêøZ_{L}italic_Z start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUBSCRIPT is rank KùêæKitalic_K as long as œµ1‚â§sK‚Å¢(Y)subscriptitalic-œµ1subscriptùë†ùêæùëå\epsilon_{1}\leq s_{K}(Y)italic_œµ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚â§ italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_K end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_Y )), and e1,‚Ä¶,eK‚àà‚ÑùKsubscriptùëí1‚Ä¶subscriptùëíùêæsuperscript‚Ñùùêæe_{1},\dots,e_{K}\in\mathbb{R}^{K}italic_e start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , ‚Ä¶ , italic_e start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_K end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚àà blackboard_R start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_K end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT be the standard basis of ‚ÑùKsuperscript‚Ñùùêæ\mathbb{R}^{K}blackboard_R start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_K end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT. We can then sum over K2superscriptùêæ2K^{2}italic_K start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT possible choices of matrices A=ei‚Å¢vjTùê¥subscriptùëíùëñsuperscriptsubscriptùë£ùëóùëáA=e_{i}v_{j}^{T}italic_A = italic_e start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_v start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_T end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT to obtain

K2‚Å¢‚ÄñŒò‚Äño‚Å¢p‚â•‚àëi,j=1K‚Äñ‚àáŒ∏(eiT‚Å¢ZL‚Å¢vj)‚Äñ22superscriptùêæ2subscriptnormŒòùëúùëùsuperscriptsubscriptùëñùëó1ùêæsuperscriptsubscriptnormsubscript‚àáùúÉsuperscriptsubscriptùëíùëñùëásubscriptùëçùêøsubscriptùë£ùëó22\displaystyle K^{2}\|\Theta\|_{op}\geq\sum_{i,j=1}^{K}\left\|\nabla_{\theta}(e% _{i}^{T}Z_{L}v_{j})\right\|_{2}^{2}italic_K start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• roman_Œò ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_o italic_p end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚â• ‚àë start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i , italic_j = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_K end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• ‚àá start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Œ∏ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_e start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_T end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_Z start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_v start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚â•‚àëi,j=1K‚àë‚Ñì=L1+1L‚ÄñW‚Ñì‚àí1:L1+1‚Å¢ZL1‚Å¢vj‚Äñ22‚Å¢‚ÄñeiT‚Å¢WL:‚Ñì+1‚Äñ22.absentsuperscriptsubscriptùëñùëó1ùêæsuperscriptsubscript‚Ñìsubscriptùêø11ùêøsuperscriptsubscriptnormsubscriptùëä:‚Ñì1subscriptùêø11subscriptùëçsubscriptùêø1subscriptùë£ùëó22superscriptsubscriptnormsuperscriptsubscriptùëíùëñùëásubscriptùëä:ùêø‚Ñì122\displaystyle\geq\sum_{i,j=1}^{K}\sum_{\ell=L_{1}+1}^{L}\left\|W_{\ell-1:L_{1}% +1}Z_{L_{1}}v_{j}\right\|_{2}^{2}\left\|e_{i}^{T}W_{L:\ell+1}\right\|_{2}^{2}.‚â• ‚àë start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i , italic_j = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_K end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚àë start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì = italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì - We know use the fact that PIm‚Å¢WL:‚ÑìT‚Å¢W‚Ñì‚àí1:L1+1‚Å¢ZL1=WL:‚Ñì+‚Å¢WL:‚Ñì‚Å¢W‚Ñì‚àí1:L1+1‚Å¢ZL1=WL:‚Ñì+‚Å¢ZLsubscriptùëÉImsuperscriptsubscriptùëä:ùêø‚Ñìùëásubscriptùëä:‚Ñì1subscriptùêø11subscriptùëçsubscriptùêø1superscriptsubscriptùëä:ùêø‚Ñìsubscriptùëä:ùêø‚Ñìsubscriptùëä:‚Ñì1subscriptùêø11subscriptùëçsubscriptùêø1superscriptsubscriptùëä:ùêø‚ÑìsubscriptùëçùêøP_{\mathrm{Im}W_{L:\ell}^{T}}W_{\ell-1:L_{1}+1}Z_{L_{1}}=W_{L:\ell}^{+}W_{L:% \ell}W_{\ell-1:L_{1}+1}Z_{L_{1}}=W_{L:\ell}^{+}Z_{L}italic_P start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_Im italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L : roman_‚Ñì end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_T end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì - 1 : italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Z start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT = italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L : roman_‚Ñì end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L : roman_‚Ñì end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì - 1 : italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Z start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT = italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L : roman_‚Ñì end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_Z start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUBSCRIPT to obtain the lower bound

K2‚Å¢‚ÄñŒò‚Äño‚Å¢psuperscriptùêæ2subscriptnormŒòùëúùëù\displaystyle K^{2}\|\Theta\|_{op}italic_K start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• roman_Œò ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_o italic_p end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚â•‚àëi,j=1K‚àë‚Ñì=L1+1L‚ÄñWL:‚Ñì+‚Å¢ZL‚Å¢vj‚Äñ22‚Å¢‚ÄñeiT‚Å¢WL:‚Ñì+1‚Äñ22absentsuperscriptsubscriptùëñùëó1ùêæsuperscriptsubscript‚Ñìsubscriptùêø11ùêøsuperscriptsubscriptnormsuperscriptsubscriptùëä:ùêø‚Ñìsubscriptùëçùêøsubscriptùë£ùëó22superscriptsubscriptnormsuperscriptsubscriptùëíùëñùëásubscriptùëä:ùêø‚Ñì122\displaystyle\geq\sum_{i,j=1}^{K}\sum_{\ell=L_{1}+1}^{L}\left\|W_{L:\ell}^{+}Z% _{L}v_{j}\right\|_{2}^{2}\left\|e_{i}^{T}W_{L:\ell+1}\right\|_{2}^{2}‚â• ‚àë start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i , italic_j = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_K end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚àë start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì = italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L : roman_‚Ñì end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_Z start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_v start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• italic_e start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_T end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L : roman_‚Ñì + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT
=‚àë‚Ñì=L1+1L‚ÄñWL:‚Ñì+‚Å¢ZL‚ÄñF2‚Å¢‚ÄñWL:‚Ñì+1‚ÄñF2absentsuperscriptsubscript‚Ñìsubscriptùêø11ùêøsuperscriptsubscriptnormsuperscriptsubscriptùëä:ùêø‚Ñìsubscriptùëçùêøùêπ2superscriptsubscriptnormsubscriptùëä:ùêø‚Ñì1ùêπ2\displaystyle=\sum_{\ell=L_{1}+1}^{L}\left\|W_{L:\ell}^{+}Z_{L}\right\|_{F}^{2% }\left\|W_{L:\ell+1}\right\|_{F}^{2}= ‚àë start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì = italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L : roman_‚Ñì end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_Z start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_F end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L : roman_‚Ñì + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_F end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT
‚â•sK‚Å¢(ZL)2‚Å¢‚àë‚Ñì=L1+1L‚ÄñWL:‚Ñì+‚ÄñF2‚Å¢‚ÄñWL:‚Ñì‚ÄñF2‚ÄñW‚Ñì‚Äño‚Å¢pabsentsubscriptùë†ùêæsuperscriptsubscriptùëçùêø2superscriptsubscript‚Ñìsubscriptùêø11ùêøsuperscriptsubscriptnormsuperscriptsubscriptùëä:ùêø‚Ñìùêπ2superscriptsubscriptnormsubscriptùëä:ùêø‚Ñìùêπ2subscriptnormsubscriptùëä‚Ñìùëúùëù\displaystyle\geq s_{K}(Z_{L})^{2}\sum_{\ell=L_{1}+1}^{L}\left\|W_{L:\ell}^{+}% \right\|_{F}^{2}\frac{\left\|W_{L:\ell}\right\|_{F}^{2}}{\left\|W_{\ell}\right% \|_{op}}‚â• italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_K end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_Z start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚àë start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì = italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L : roman_‚Ñì end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_F end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG ‚à• italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L : roman_‚Ñì end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_F end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG ‚à• italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_o italic_p end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG
‚â•(sK‚Å¢(Y)‚àíœµ1)2r2‚Å¢‚àë‚Ñì=L1+1LŒ∫‚Å¢(WL:‚Ñì)2.absentsuperscriptsubscriptùë†ùêæùëåsubscriptitalic-œµ12superscriptùëü2superscriptsubscript‚Ñìsubscriptùêø11ùêøùúÖsuperscriptsubscriptùëä:ùêø‚Ñì2\displaystyle\geq\frac{\left(s_{K}(Y)-\epsilon_{1}\right)^{2}}{r^{2}}\sum_{% \ell=L_{1}+1}^{L}\kappa(W_{L:\ell})^{2}.‚â• divide start_ARG ( italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_K end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_Y ) - italic_œµ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_r start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG ‚àë start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì = italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_Œ∫ ( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L : roman_‚Ñì end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT .

This then implies that

C‚Å¢L2‚â•‚ÄñŒò‚Äño‚Å¢p‚â•(sK‚Å¢(Y)‚àíœµ1)2K2‚Å¢r2‚Å¢‚àë‚Ñì=L1+1LŒ∫‚Å¢(WL:‚Ñì)2.ùê∂subscriptùêø2subscriptnormŒòùëúùëùsuperscriptsubscriptùë†ùêæùëåsubscriptitalic-œµ12superscriptùêæ2superscriptùëü2superscriptsubscript‚Ñìsubscriptùêø11ùêøùúÖsuperscriptsubscriptùëä:ùêø‚Ñì2CL_{2}\geq\left\|\Theta\right\|_{op}\geq\frac{\left(s_{K}(Y)-\epsilon_{1}% \right)^{2}}{K^{2}r^{2}}\sum_{\ell=L_{1}+1}^{L}\kappa(W_{L:\ell})^{2}.italic_C italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚â• ‚à• roman_Œò ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_o italic_p end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚â• divide start_ARG ( italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_K end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_Y ) - italic_œµ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_K start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_r start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG ‚àë start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì = italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_Œ∫ ( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L : roman_‚Ñì end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT .

Let us now assume by contradiction that for all the layers ‚Ñì‚àà{L1+1,‚Ä¶,L1+M}‚Ñìsubscriptùêø11‚Ä¶subscriptùêø1ùëÄ\ell\in\{L_{1}+1,\dots,L_{1}+M\}roman_‚Ñì ‚àà { italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 , ‚Ä¶ , italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_M } we have Œ∫‚Å¢(WL:‚Ñì)2>C‚Å¢L2‚Å¢K2‚Å¢r2M‚Å¢(sK‚Å¢(Y)‚àíœµ1)2ùúÖsuperscriptsubscriptùëä:ùêø‚Ñì2ùê∂subscriptùêø2superscriptùêæ2superscriptùëü2ùëÄsuperscriptsubscriptùë†ùêæùëåsubscriptitalic-œµ12\kappa(W_{L:\ell})^{2}>\frac{CL_{2}K^{2}r^{2}}{M\left(s_{K}(Y)-\epsilon_{1}% \right)^{2}}italic_Œ∫ ( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L : roman_‚Ñì end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT > divide start_ARG italic_C italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_K start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_r start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_M ( italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_K end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_Y ) - italic_œµ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG, then

(sK‚Å¢(Y)‚àíœµ1)2K2‚Å¢r2‚Å¢‚àë‚Ñì=L1+1LŒ∫‚Å¢(WL:‚Ñì)2>C‚Å¢L2,superscriptsubscriptùë†ùêæùëåsubscriptitalic-œµ12superscriptùêæ2superscriptùëü2superscriptsubscript‚Ñìsubscriptùêø11ùêøùúÖsuperscriptsubscriptùëä:ùêø‚Ñì2ùê∂subscriptùêø2\frac{\left(s_{K}(Y)-\epsilon_{1}\right)^{2}}{K^{2}r^{2}}\sum_{\ell=L_{1}+1}^{% L}\kappa(W_{L:\ell})^{2}>CL_{2},divide start_ARG ( italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_K end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_Y ) - italic_œµ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_K start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_r start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG ‚àë start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì = italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_Œ∫ ( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L : roman_‚Ñì end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT > italic_C italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ,

which yields a contradiction. Therefore, there must be a layer within the layers ‚Ñì‚àà{L1+1,‚Ä¶,L1+M}‚Ñìsubscriptùêø11‚Ä¶subscriptùêø1ùëÄ\ell\in\{L_{1}+1,\dots,L_{1}+M\}roman_‚Ñì ‚àà { italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 , ‚Ä¶ , italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_M } such that Œ∫‚Å¢(WL:‚Ñì)2‚â§C‚Å¢L2‚Å¢K2‚Å¢r2M‚Å¢(sK‚Å¢(Y)‚àíœµ1)2ùúÖsuperscriptsubscriptùëä:ùêø‚Ñì2ùê∂subscriptùêø2superscriptùêæ2superscriptùëü2ùëÄsuperscriptsubscriptùë†ùêæùëåsubscriptitalic-œµ12\kappa(W_{L:\ell})^{2}\leq\frac{CL_{2}K^{2}r^{2}}{M\left(s_{K}(Y)-\epsilon_{1}% \right)^{2}}italic_Œ∫ ( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L : roman_‚Ñì end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚â§ divide start_ARG italic_C italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_K start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_r start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_M ( italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_K end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_Y ) - italic_œµ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG.

Furthermore, since Œ∫‚Å¢(WL:‚Ñì)‚â•1ùúÖsubscriptùëä:ùêø‚Ñì1\kappa(W_{L:\ell})\geq 1italic_Œ∫ ( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L : roman_‚Ñì end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ‚â• 1, we know that

‚ÄñŒò‚Äño‚Å¢p‚â•(sK‚Å¢(Y)‚àíœµ1)2K2‚Å¢r2‚Å¢L2.subscriptnormŒòùëúùëùsuperscriptsubscriptùë†ùêæùëåsubscriptitalic-œµ12superscriptùêæ2superscriptùëü2subscriptùêø2\left\|\Theta\right\|_{op}\geq\frac{\left(s_{K}(Y)-\epsilon_{1}\right)^{2}}{K^% {2}r^{2}}L_{2}.‚à• roman_Œò ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_o italic_p end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚â• divide start_ARG ( italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_K end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_Y ) - italic_œµ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_K start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_r start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT .

‚àé

Appendix C Technical Results

Lemma C.1.

Let b‚â•1ùëè1b\geq 1italic_b ‚â• 1 be s.t. ‚ÄñX:i‚Äñ2‚â§bsubscriptnormsubscriptùëã:absentùëñ2ùëè\|X_{:i}\|_{2}\leq b‚à• italic_X start_POSTSUBSCRIPT : italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚â§ italic_b for all iùëñiitalic_i. Then, inside the set of parameters with bounded weights ‚ÄñW‚Ñì‚Äño‚Å¢p‚â§r‚Ñìsubscriptnormsubscriptùëä‚Ñìùëúùëùsubscriptùëü‚Ñì\left\|W_{\ell}\right\|_{op}\leq r_{\ell}‚à• italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_o italic_p end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚â§ italic_r start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì end_POSTSUBSCRIPT for all ‚Ñì‚àà[L]‚Ñìdelimited-[]ùêø\ell\in[L]roman_‚Ñì ‚àà [ italic_L ] and r‚Ñì‚â•1subscriptùëü‚Ñì1r_{\ell}\geq 1italic_r start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚â• 1, the gradient of the loss ‚àáC0‚Å¢(Œ∏)‚àásubscriptùê∂0ùúÉ\nabla C_{0}(\theta)‚àá italic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_Œ∏ ) is 5‚Å¢N‚Å¢Œ≤‚Å¢b3‚Å¢(‚àèj=1Lrj)3‚Å¢L5/25ùëÅùõΩsuperscriptùëè3superscriptsuperscriptsubscriptproductùëó1ùêøsubscriptùëüùëó3superscriptùêø525N\beta b^{3}\left(\prod_{j=1}^{L}r_{j}\right)^{3}L^{5/2}5 italic_N italic_Œ≤ italic_b start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 3 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( ‚àè start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_r start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 3 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 5 / 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT-Lipschitz.

Proof.

Consider two parameters Œ∏=(W‚Ñì)‚Ñì=1L,Œ∏‚Ä≤=(W‚Ñì‚Ä≤)‚Ñì=1Lformulae-sequenceùúÉsuperscriptsubscriptsubscriptùëä‚Ñì‚Ñì1ùêøsuperscriptùúÉ‚Ä≤superscriptsubscriptsuperscriptsubscriptùëä‚Ñì‚Ä≤‚Ñì1ùêø\theta=(W_{\ell})_{\ell=1}^{L},\theta^{\prime}=(W_{\ell}^{\prime})_{\ell=1}^{L}italic_Œ∏ = ( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT , italic_Œ∏ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚Ä≤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT = ( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚Ä≤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT, and let Zm,Zm‚Ä≤subscriptùëçùëösuperscriptsubscriptùëçùëö‚Ä≤Z_{m},Z_{m}^{\prime}italic_Z start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_Z start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚Ä≤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT be the corresponding outputs at layer mùëömitalic_m. Then, we obtain the following telescopic sum:

(Zm):i‚àí(Zm‚Ä≤):i=‚àë‚Ñì=1L(Wm‚Å¢‚ãØ‚Å¢W‚Ñì+1‚àòœÉ‚àòW‚Ñì‚àòœÉ‚àòW‚Ñì‚àí1‚Ä≤‚Å¢‚ãØ‚àòW1‚Ä≤)‚Å¢(X:i)‚àí(Wm‚Å¢‚ãØ‚Å¢W‚Ñì+1‚àòœÉ‚àòW‚Ñì‚Ä≤‚àòœÉ‚àòW‚Ñì‚àí1‚Ä≤‚àò‚ãØ‚àòW1‚Ä≤)‚Å¢(X:i),subscriptsubscriptùëçùëö:absentùëñsubscriptsuperscriptsubscriptùëçùëö‚Ä≤:absentùëñsuperscriptsubscript‚Ñì1ùêøsubscriptùëäùëö‚ãØsubscriptùëä‚Ñì1ùúésubscriptùëä‚Ñìùúésubscriptsuperscriptùëä‚Ä≤‚Ñì1‚ãØsubscriptsuperscriptùëä‚Ä≤1subscriptùëã:absentùëñsubscriptùëäùëö‚ãØsubscriptùëä‚Ñì1ùúésubscriptsuperscriptùëä‚Ä≤‚Ñìùúésubscriptsuperscriptùëä‚Ä≤‚Ñì1‚ãØsubscriptsuperscriptùëä‚Ä≤1subscriptùëã:absentùëñ\begin{split}(Z_{m})_{:i}-(Z_{m}^{\prime})_{:i}&=\sum_{\ell=1}^{L}(W_{m}\cdots W% _{\ell+1}\circ\sigma\circ W_{\ell}\circ\sigma\circ W^{\prime}_{\ell-1}\cdots% \circ W^{\prime}_{1})(X_{:i})\\ &-(W_{m}\cdots{}W_{\ell+1}\circ\sigma\circ W^{\prime}_{\ell}\circ\sigma\circ W% ^{\prime}_{\ell-1}\circ\cdots\circ W^{\prime}_{1})(X_{:i}),\end{split}start_ROW start_CELL ( italic_Z start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUBSCRIPT : italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - ( italic_Z start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚Ä≤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUBSCRIPT : italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_CELL start_CELL = ‚àë start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚ãØ italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚àò italic_œÉ ‚àò italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚àò italic_œÉ ‚àò italic_W start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚Ä≤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì - so that

‚Äñ(Zm)i:‚àí(Zm‚Ä≤)i:‚Äñ2‚â§‚àë‚Ñì=1m‚àèj=1m‚àí1rj‚Å¢‚ÄñW‚Ñì‚àíW‚Ñì‚Ä≤‚ÄñF‚Å¢‚ÄñX:i‚Äñ2‚â§b‚Å¢‚àèj=1L‚àí1rj‚Å¢m‚Å¢‚àë‚Ñì=1m‚ÄñW‚Ñì‚àíW‚Ñì‚Ä≤‚ÄñF2‚â§b‚Å¢‚àèj=1L‚àí1rj‚Å¢m‚Å¢‚ÄñŒ∏‚àíŒ∏‚Ä≤‚Äñ2.subscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•subscriptsubscriptùëçùëö:ùëñabsentsubscriptsuperscriptsubscriptùëçùëö‚Ä≤:ùëñabsent2superscriptsubscript‚Ñì1ùëösuperscriptsubscriptproductùëó1ùëö1subscriptùëüùëósubscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•subscriptùëä‚Ñìsubscriptsuperscriptùëä‚Ä≤‚Ñìùêπsubscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•subscriptùëã:absentùëñ2ùëèsuperscriptsubscriptproductùëó1ùêø1subscriptùëüùëóùëösuperscriptsubscript‚Ñì1ùëösuperscriptsubscriptnormsubscriptùëä‚Ñìsubscriptsuperscriptùëä‚Ä≤‚Ñìùêπ2ùëèsuperscriptsubscriptproductùëó1ùêø1subscriptùëüùëóùëösubscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•ùúÉsuperscriptùúÉ‚Ä≤2\begin{split}\left\|(Z_{m})_{i:}-(Z_{m}^{\prime})_{i:}\right\|_{2}&\leq\sum_{% \ell=1}^{m}\prod_{j=1}^{m-1}r_{j}\left\|W_{\ell}-W^{\prime}_{\ell}\right\|_{F}% \left\|X_{:i}\right\|_{2}\\ &\leq b\prod_{j=1}^{L-1}r_{j}\sqrt{m}\sqrt{\sum_{\ell=1}^{m}\left\|W_{\ell}-W^% {\prime}_{\ell}\right\|_{F}^{2}}\leq b\prod_{j=1}^{L-1}r_{j}\sqrt{m}\left\|% \theta-\theta^{\prime}\right\|_{2}.\end{split}start_ROW start_CELL ‚à• ( italic_Z start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i : end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_r start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - italic_W start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚Ä≤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_F end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• italic_X start_POSTSUBSCRIPT : italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_CELL end_ROW start_ROW start_CELL end_CELL start_CELL ‚â§ italic_b ‚àè start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L - 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_r start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUBSCRIPT square-root start_ARG italic_m end_ARG square-root start_ARG ‚àë start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_m end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì end_POSTSUBSCRIPT -
