Now, the gradient equals

‚àáC0‚Å¢(Œ∏)=(‚àëi=1N‚àèj=1‚Ñì‚àí1Dj,i‚Å¢Wj‚Å¢X:i‚Å¢(Y:i‚àí(ZL):i)‚ä§‚Å¢‚àèj=‚Ñì+1LWj‚Å¢Dj,i)‚Ñì=1,‚Ä¶,L‚ä§‚àásubscriptùê∂0ùúÉsubscriptsuperscriptsuperscriptsubscriptùëñ1ùëÅsuperscriptsubscriptproductùëó1‚Ñì1subscriptùê∑ùëóùëñsubscriptùëäùëósubscriptùëã:absentùëñsuperscriptsubscriptùëå:absentùëñsubscriptsubscriptùëçùêø:absentùëñtopsuperscriptsubscriptproductùëó‚Ñì1ùêøsubscriptùëäùëósubscriptùê∑ùëóùëñtop‚Ñì1‚Ä¶ùêø\nabla C_{0}(\theta)=\left(\sum_{i=1}^{N}\prod_{j=1}^{\ell-1}D_{j,i}W_{j}X_{:i% }(Y_{:i}-(Z_{L})_{:i})^{\top}\prod_{j=\ell+1}^{L}W_{j}D_{j,i}\right)^{\top}_{% \ell=1,\dots,L}‚àá italic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_Œ∏ ) = ( ‚àë start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_N end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚àè start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì - 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_D start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j , italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_X start_POSTSUBSCRIPT : italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_Y start_POSTSUBSCRIPT : italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - ( italic_Z start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUBSCRIPT : italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ä§ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚àè start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j = roman_‚Ñì + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_D start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j , italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ä§ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì = 1 , ‚Ä¶ , italic_L end_POSTSUBSCRIPT

where Dj,isubscriptùê∑ùëóùëñD_{j,i}italic_D start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j , italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT is a diagonal matrix with diagonal entries given equal to the vector œÉ‚Ä≤‚Å¢((Zj):i)superscriptùúé‚Ä≤subscriptsubscriptùëçùëó:absentùëñ\sigma^{\prime}((Z_{j})_{:i})italic_œÉ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚Ä≤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( ( italic_Z start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUBSCRIPT : italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) for j‚àà[L1]ùëódelimited-[]subscriptùêø1j\in[L_{1}]italic_j ‚àà [ italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ] and it is equal to the identity otherwise. Similarly, we define Dj,i‚Ä≤superscriptsubscriptùê∑ùëóùëñ‚Ä≤D_{j,i}^{\prime}italic_D start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j , italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚Ä≤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT as a diagonal matrix with diagonal entries given equal to the vector œÉ‚Ä≤‚Å¢((Zj‚Ä≤):i)superscriptùúé‚Ä≤subscriptsuperscriptsubscriptùëçùëó‚Ä≤:absentùëñ\sigma^{\prime}((Z_{j}^{\prime})_{:i})italic_œÉ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚Ä≤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( ( italic_Z start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚Ä≤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUBSCRIPT : italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) for j‚àà[L1]ùëódelimited-[]subscriptùêø1j\in[L_{1}]italic_j ‚àà [ italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ] and equal to the identity otherwise. Since œÉ‚Ä≤superscriptùúé‚Ä≤\sigma^{\prime}italic_œÉ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚Ä≤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT is Œ≤ùõΩ\betaitalic_Œ≤-Lipschitz, we have

‚ÄñDj,i‚àíDj,i‚Ä≤‚ÄñF‚â§Œ≤‚Å¢b‚Å¢‚àèj=1L‚àí1rj‚Å¢m‚Å¢‚ÄñŒ∏‚àíŒ∏‚Ä≤‚Äñ2.subscriptnormsubscriptùê∑ùëóùëñsuperscriptsubscriptùê∑ùëóùëñ‚Ä≤ùêπùõΩùëèsuperscriptsubscriptproductùëó1ùêø1subscriptùëüùëóùëösubscriptnormùúÉsuperscriptùúÉ‚Ä≤2\left\|D_{j,i}-D_{j,i}^{\prime}\right\|_{F}\leq\beta b\prod_{j=1}^{L-1}r_{j}% \sqrt{m}\left\|\theta-\theta^{\prime}\right\|_{2}.‚à• italic_D start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j , italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - italic_D start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j , italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚Ä≤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_F end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚â§ italic_Œ≤ italic_b ‚àè start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L - 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_r start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUBSCRIPT square-root start_ARG italic_m end_ARG ‚à• italic_Œ∏ - italic_Œ∏ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚Ä≤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT .

Furthermore since œÉ‚Ä≤‚â§1superscriptùúé‚Ä≤1\sigma^{\prime}\leq 1italic_œÉ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚Ä≤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚â§ 1 ,we have that ‚ÄñDj,i‚Äño‚Å¢p‚â§1subscriptnormsubscriptùê∑ùëóùëñùëúùëù1\left\|D_{j,i}\right\|_{op}\leq 1‚à• italic_D start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j , italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_o italic_p end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚â§ 1. By summing over all terms that need to be changed, we obtain

‚Äñ‚àáC0‚Å¢(Œ∏)‚àí‚àáC‚Å¢(Œ∏‚Ä≤)‚Äñ2subscriptnorm‚àásubscriptùê∂0ùúÉ‚àáùê∂superscriptùúÉ‚Ä≤2\displaystyle\left\|\nabla C_{0}(\theta)-\nabla C(\theta^{\prime})\right\|_{2}‚à• ‚àá italic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_Œ∏ ) - ‚àá italic_C ( italic_Œ∏ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚Ä≤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚â§‚àë‚Ñì=1L‚àëi=1N‚ÄñX:i‚Äñ2‚Å¢‚ÄñY:i‚àí(ZL):i‚Äñ2‚Å¢‚àëm‚â†‚Ñì‚àèj‚àâ{m,L}rj‚Å¢‚ÄñWm‚àíWm‚Ä≤‚ÄñFabsentsuperscriptsubscript‚Ñì1ùêøsuperscriptsubscriptùëñ1ùëÅsubscriptnormsubscriptùëã:absentùëñ2subscriptnormsubscriptùëå:absentùëñsubscriptsubscriptùëçùêø:absentùëñ2subscriptùëö‚Ñìsubscriptproductùëóùëöùêøsubscriptùëüùëósubscriptnormsubscriptùëäùëösubscriptsuperscriptùëä‚Ä≤ùëöùêπ\displaystyle\leq\sum_{\ell=1}^{L}\sum_{i=1}^{N}\left\|X_{:i}\right\|_{2}\left% \|Y_{:i}-(Z_{L})_{:i}\right\|_{2}\sum_{m\neq\ell}\prod_{j\not\in\{m,L\}}r_{j}% \left\|W_{m}-W^{\prime}_{m}\right\|_{F}‚â§ ‚àë start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚àë start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_N end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• italic_X start_POSTSUBSCRIPT : italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• italic_Y start_POSTSUBSCRIPT : italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - ( italic_Z start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUBSCRIPT : italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚àë start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_m ‚â† roman_‚Ñì end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚àè start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j ‚àâ { italic_m , italic_L } end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_r start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - italic_W start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚Ä≤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_F end_POSTSUBSCRIPT
+‚àë‚Ñì=1L‚àëi=1N‚ÄñX:i‚Äñ2‚Å¢‚ÄñY:i‚àí(ZL):i‚Äñ2‚Å¢‚àëm=1L1(‚àèj=1L‚àí1rj)2‚Å¢Œ≤‚Å¢m‚Å¢‚ÄñŒ∏‚àíŒ∏‚Ä≤‚Äñ2‚Å¢‚ÄñX:i‚Äñ2superscriptsubscript‚Ñì1ùêøsuperscriptsubscriptùëñ1ùëÅsubscriptnormsubscriptùëã:absentùëñ2subscriptnormsubscriptùëå:absentùëñsubscriptsubscriptùëçùêø:absentùëñ2superscriptsubscriptùëö1subscriptùêø1superscriptsuperscriptsubscriptproductùëó1ùêø1subscriptùëüùëó2ùõΩùëösubscriptnormùúÉsuperscriptùúÉ‚Ä≤2subscriptnormsubscriptùëã:absentùëñ2\displaystyle+\sum_{\ell=1}^{L}\sum_{i=1}^{N}\left\|X_{:i}\right\|_{2}\left\|Y% _{:i}-(Z_{L})_{:i}\right\|_{2}\sum_{m=1}^{L_{1}}\left(\prod_{j=1}^{L-1}r_{j}% \right)^{2}\beta\sqrt{m}\left\|\theta-\theta^{\prime}\right\|_{2}\left\|X_{:i}% \right\|_{2}+ ‚àë start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚àë start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_N end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• italic_X start_POSTSUBSCRIPT : italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• italic_Y start_POSTSUBSCRIPT : italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - ( italic_Z start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUBSCRIPT : italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚àë start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_m = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( ‚àè start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L - 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_r start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_Œ≤ square-root start_ARG italic_m end_ARG ‚à• italic_Œ∏ - italic_Œ∏ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚Ä≤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• italic_X start_POSTSUBSCRIPT : italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT
+‚àë‚Ñì=1L‚àëi=1N‚ÄñX:i‚Äñ2‚Å¢(‚àèj=1L‚àí1rj)2‚Å¢L‚Å¢‚ÄñŒ∏‚àíŒ∏‚Ä≤‚Äñ2‚Å¢‚ÄñX:i‚Äñ2,superscriptsubscript‚Ñì1ùêøsuperscriptsubscriptùëñ1ùëÅsubscriptnormsubscriptùëã:absentùëñ2superscriptsuperscriptsubscriptproductùëó1ùêø1subscriptùëüùëó2ùêøsubscriptnormùúÉsuperscriptùúÉ‚Ä≤2subscriptnormsubscriptùëã:absentùëñ2\displaystyle+\sum_{\ell=1}^{L}\sum_{i=1}^{N}\left\|X_{:i}\right\|_{2}\left(% \prod_{j=1}^{L-1}r_{j}\right)^{2}\sqrt{L}\left\|\theta-\theta^{\prime}\right\|% _{2}\left\|X_{:i}\right\|_{2},+ ‚àë start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚àë start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_N end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• italic_X start_POSTSUBSCRIPT : italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( ‚àè start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L - 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_r start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT square-root start_ARG italic_L end_ARG ‚à• italic_Œ∏ - italic_Œ∏ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚Ä≤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• italic_X start_POSTSUBSCRIPT : italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ,

where the three terms correspond to the effect of changing the W‚Ñìsubscriptùëä‚ÑìW_{\ell}italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì end_POSTSUBSCRIPT‚Äôs, the D‚Ñìsubscriptùê∑‚ÑìD_{\ell}italic_D start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì end_POSTSUBSCRIPT‚Äôs and the Z‚Ñìsubscriptùëç‚ÑìZ_{\ell}italic_Z start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì end_POSTSUBSCRIPT‚Äôs respectively. This can then be simplified to

‚Äñ‚àáC0‚Å¢(Œ∏)‚àí‚àáC0‚Å¢(Œ∏)‚Äñ2subscriptnorm‚àásubscriptùê∂0ùúÉ‚àásubscriptùê∂0ùúÉ2\displaystyle\left\|\nabla C_{0}(\theta)-\nabla C_{0}(\theta)\right\|_{2}‚à• ‚àá italic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_Œ∏ ) - ‚àá italic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_Œ∏ ) ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚â§N‚Å¢b2‚Å¢(1+‚àèj=1Lrj)‚Å¢‚àèj=1L‚àí1rj‚Å¢L3/2‚Å¢‚ÄñŒ∏‚àíŒ∏‚Ä≤‚Äñ2absentùëÅsuperscriptùëè21superscriptsubscriptproductùëó1ùêøsubscriptùëüùëósuperscriptsubscriptproductùëó1ùêø1subscriptùëüùëósuperscriptùêø32subscriptnormùúÉsuperscriptùúÉ‚Ä≤2\displaystyle\leq Nb^{2}\left(1+\prod_{j=1}^{L}r_{j}\right)\prod_{j=1}^{L-1}r_% {j}L^{3/2}\left\|\theta-\theta^{\prime}\right\|_{2}‚â§ italic_N italic_b start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( 1 + ‚àè start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_r start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ‚àè start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L - 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_r start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 3 / 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• italic_Œ∏ - italic_Œ∏ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚Ä≤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT
+N‚Å¢b3‚Å¢(1+‚àèj=1Lrj)‚Å¢(‚àèj=1L‚àí1rj)2‚Å¢L‚Å¢L13/2‚Å¢Œ≤‚Å¢‚ÄñŒ∏‚àíŒ∏‚Ä≤‚Äñ2ùëÅsuperscriptùëè31superscriptsubscriptproductùëó1ùêøsubscriptùëüùëósuperscriptsuperscriptsubscriptproductùëó1ùêø1subscriptùëüùëó2ùêøsuperscriptsubscriptùêø132ùõΩsubscriptnormùúÉsuperscriptùúÉ‚Ä≤2\displaystyle+Nb^{3}\left(1+\prod_{j=1}^{L}r_{j}\right)\left(\prod_{j=1}^{L-1}% r_{j}\right)^{2}LL_{1}^{3/2}\beta\left\|\theta-\theta^{\prime}\right\|_{2}+ italic_N italic_b start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 3 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( 1 + ‚àè start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_r start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ( ‚àè start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L - 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_r start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 3 / 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_Œ≤ ‚à• italic_Œ∏ - italic_Œ∏ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚Ä≤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT
+N‚Å¢b2‚Å¢(‚àèj=1L‚àí1rj)2‚Å¢L3/2‚Å¢‚ÄñŒ∏‚àíŒ∏‚Ä≤‚Äñ2ùëÅsuperscriptùëè2superscriptsuperscriptsubscriptproductùëó1ùêø1subscriptùëüùëó2superscriptùêø32subscriptnormùúÉsuperscriptùúÉ‚Ä≤2\displaystyle+Nb^{2}\left(\prod_{j=1}^{L-1}r_{j}\right)^{2}L^{3/2}\left\|% \theta-\theta^{\prime}\right\|_{2}+ italic_N italic_b start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( ‚àè start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L - 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_r start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 3 / 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• italic_Œ∏ - italic_Œ∏ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚Ä≤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT
‚â§5‚Å¢N‚Å¢Œ≤‚Å¢b3‚Å¢(‚àèj=1Lrj)3‚Å¢L5/2‚Å¢‚ÄñŒ∏‚àíŒ∏‚Ä≤‚Äñ2,absent5ùëÅùõΩsuperscriptùëè3superscriptsuperscriptsubscriptproductùëó1ùêøsubscriptùëüùëó3superscriptùêø52subscriptnormùúÉsuperscriptùúÉ‚Ä≤2\displaystyle\leq 5N\beta b^{3}\left(\prod_{j=1}^{L}r_{j}\right)^{3}L^{5/2}% \left\|\theta-\theta^{\prime}\right\|_{2},‚â§ 5 italic_N italic_Œ≤ italic_b start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 3 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( ‚àè start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_r start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 3 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 5 / 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• italic_Œ∏ - italic_Œ∏ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚Ä≤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ,

where we use the fact that ‚Äñ(ZL):i‚Äñ2‚â§b‚Å¢‚àèj=1Lrjsubscriptnormsubscriptsubscriptùëçùêø:absentùëñ2ùëèsuperscriptsubscriptproductùëó1ùêøsubscriptùëüùëó\left\|(Z_{L})_{:i}\right\|_{2}\leq b\prod_{j=1}^{L}r_{j}‚à• ( italic_Z start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUBSCRIPT : italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚â§ italic_b ‚àè start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_r start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUBSCRIPT. ‚àé

Lemma C.2.

If the network satisfies

  • ‚Ä¢

    approximate balancedness ‚ÄñW‚Ñì+1T‚Å¢W‚Ñì+1‚àíW‚Ñì‚Å¢W‚ÑìT‚Äño‚Å¢p‚â§œµ2subscriptnormsuperscriptsubscriptùëä‚Ñì1ùëásubscriptùëä‚Ñì1subscriptùëä‚Ñìsuperscriptsubscriptùëä‚Ñìùëáùëúùëùsubscriptitalic-œµ2\left\|W_{\ell+1}^{T}W_{\ell+1}-W_{\ell}W_{\ell}^{T}\right\|_{op}\leq\epsilon_% {2}‚à• italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_T end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_T end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_o italic_p end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚â§ italic_œµ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT for ‚Ñì‚àà{L1+1,‚ãØ‚Å¢L‚àí1}‚Ñìsubscriptùêø11‚ãØùêø1\ell\in\{L_{1}+1,\cdots L-1\}roman_‚Ñì ‚àà { italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 , ‚ãØ italic_L - 1 },

  • ‚Ä¢

    bounded weights ‚ÄñW‚Ñì‚Äño‚Å¢p‚â§rsubscriptnormsubscriptùëä‚Ñìùëúùëùùëü\left\|W_{\ell}\right\|_{op}\leq r‚à• italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_o italic_p end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚â§ italic_r for ‚Ñì‚àà{L1+1,‚ãØ,L}‚Ñìsubscriptùêø11‚ãØùêø\ell\in\{L_{1}+1,\cdots,L\}roman_‚Ñì ‚àà { italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 , ‚ãØ , italic_L },

then we have ‚Äñ(WL‚Å¢WL‚ä§)L2‚àíWL:L1+1‚Å¢WL:L1+1‚ä§‚Äño‚Å¢p‚â§L222‚Å¢œµ2‚Å¢r2‚Å¢(L2‚àí1)subscriptnormsuperscriptsubscriptùëäùêøsuperscriptsubscriptùëäùêøtopsubscriptùêø2subscriptùëä:ùêøsubscriptùêø11superscriptsubscriptùëä:ùêøsubscriptùêø11topùëúùëùsuperscriptsubscriptùêø222subscriptitalic-œµ2superscriptùëü2subscriptùêø21\left\|\left(W_{L}W_{L}^{\top}\right)^{L_{2}}-W_{L:L_{1}+1}W_{L:L_{1}+1}^{\top% }\right\|_{op}\leq\frac{L_{2}^{2}}{2}\epsilon_{2}r^{2(L_{2}-1)}‚à• ( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ä§ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L : italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L : italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ä§ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_o italic_p end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚â§ divide start_ARG italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG italic_œµ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_r start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 ( italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - 1 ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT, where L2=L‚àíL1subscriptùêø2ùêøsubscriptùêø1L_{2}=L-L_{1}italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT = italic_L - italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT.

Proof.

We denote D‚Ñì:=W‚Ñì‚Å¢W‚Ñì‚ä§‚àíW‚Ñì+1‚ä§‚Å¢W‚Ñì+1assignsubscriptùê∑‚Ñìsubscriptùëä‚Ñìsuperscriptsubscriptùëä‚Ñìtopsuperscriptsubscriptùëä‚Ñì1topsubscriptùëä‚Ñì1D_{\ell}:=W_{\ell}W_{\ell}^{\top}-W_{\ell+1}^{\top}W_{\ell+1}italic_D start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì end_POSTSUBSCRIPT := italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ä§ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ä§ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT and

E‚Ñì=‚àëi=L1+1‚Ñì(W‚Ñì+1‚ä§‚Å¢W‚Ñì+1)i‚àíL1‚àí1‚Å¢D‚Ñì‚Å¢(W‚Ñì‚Å¢W‚Ñì‚ä§)‚Ñì‚àíi.subscriptùê∏‚Ñìsuperscriptsubscriptùëñsubscriptùêø11‚Ñìsuperscriptsuperscriptsubscriptùëä‚Ñì1topsubscriptùëä‚Ñì1ùëñsubscriptùêø11subscriptùê∑‚Ñìsuperscriptsubscriptùëä‚Ñìsuperscriptsubscriptùëä‚Ñìtop‚ÑìùëñE_{\ell}=\sum_{i=L_{1}+1}^{\ell}\left(W_{\ell+1}^{\top}W_{\ell+1}\right)^{i-L_% {1}-1}D_{\ell}\left(W_{\ell}W_{\ell}^{\top}\right)^{\ell-i}.italic_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì end_POSTSUBSCRIPT = ‚àë start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ä§ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_i - italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_D start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ä§ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì - italic_i end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT .

We have that

(W‚Ñì‚Å¢W‚Ñì‚ä§)‚Ñì‚àíL1superscriptsubscriptùëä‚Ñìsuperscriptsubscriptùëä‚Ñìtop‚Ñìsubscriptùêø1\displaystyle\left(W_{\ell}W_{\ell}^{\top}\right)^{\ell-L_{1}}( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ä§ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì - italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT =D‚Ñì‚Å¢(W‚Ñì‚Å¢W‚Ñì‚ä§)‚Ñì‚àíL1‚àí1+W‚Ñì+1‚ä§‚Å¢W‚Ñì+1‚Å¢(W‚Ñì‚Å¢W‚Ñì‚ä§)‚Ñì‚àíL1‚àí1absentsubscriptùê∑‚Ñìsuperscriptsubscriptùëä‚Ñìsuperscriptsubscriptùëä‚Ñìtop‚Ñìsubscriptùêø11superscriptsubscriptùëä‚Ñì1topsubscriptùëä‚Ñì1superscriptsubscriptùëä‚Ñìsuperscriptsubscriptùëä‚Ñìtop‚Ñìsubscriptùêø11\displaystyle=D_{\ell}\left(W_{\ell}W_{\ell}^{\top}\right)^{\ell-L_{1}-1}+W_{% \ell+1}^{\top}W_{\ell+1}\left(W_{\ell}W_{\ell}^{\top}\right)^{\ell-L_{1}-1}= italic_D start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ä§ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì - italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ä§ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ä§ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì - italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT
=D‚Ñì‚Å¢(W‚Ñì‚Å¢W‚Ñì‚ä§)‚Ñì‚àíL1‚àí1+W‚Ñì+1‚ä§‚Å¢W‚Ñì+1‚Å¢D‚Ñì‚Å¢(W‚Ñì‚Å¢W‚Ñì‚ä§)‚Ñì‚àíL1‚àí2+(W‚Ñì+1‚ä§‚Å¢W‚Ñì+1)2‚Å¢(W‚Ñì‚Å¢W‚Ñì‚ä§)‚Ñì‚àíL1‚àí2absentsubscriptùê∑‚Ñìsuperscriptsubscriptùëä‚Ñìsuperscriptsubscriptùëä‚Ñìtop‚Ñìsubscriptùêø11superscriptsubscriptùëä‚Ñì1topsubscriptùëä‚Ñì1subscriptùê∑‚Ñìsuperscriptsubscriptùëä‚Ñìsuperscriptsubscriptùëä‚Ñìtop‚Ñìsubscriptùêø12superscriptsuperscriptsubscriptùëä‚Ñì1topsubscriptùëä‚Ñì12superscriptsubscriptùëä‚Ñìsuperscriptsubscriptùëä‚Ñìtop‚Ñìsubscriptùêø12\displaystyle=D_{\ell}\left(W_{\ell}W_{\ell}^{\top}\right)^{\ell-L_{1}-1}+W_{% \ell+1}^{\top}W_{\ell+1}D_{\ell}\left(W_{\ell}W_{\ell}^{\top}\right)^{\ell-L_{% 1}-2}+\left(W_{\ell+1}^{\top}W_{\ell+1}\right)^{2}\left(W_{\ell}W_{\ell}^{\top% }\right)^{\ell-L_{1}-2}= italic_D start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ä§ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì - =(W‚Ñì+1‚ä§‚Å¢W‚Ñì+1)‚Ñì‚àíL1+‚àëi=L1+1‚Ñì(W‚Ñì+1‚ä§‚Å¢W‚Ñì+1)i‚àíL1‚àí1‚Å¢D‚Ñì‚Å¢(W‚Ñì‚Å¢W‚Ñì‚ä§)‚Ñì‚àíiabsentsuperscriptsuperscriptsubscriptùëä‚Ñì1topsubscriptùëä‚Ñì1‚Ñìsubscriptùêø1superscriptsubscriptùëñsubscriptùêø11‚Ñìsuperscriptsuperscriptsubscriptùëä‚Ñì1topsubscriptùëä‚Ñì1ùëñsubscriptùêø11subscriptùê∑‚Ñìsuperscriptsubscriptùëä‚Ñìsuperscriptsubscriptùëä‚Ñìtop‚Ñìùëñ\displaystyle=\left(W_{\ell+1}^{\top}W_{\ell+1}\right)^{\ell-L_{1}}+\sum_{i=L_% {1}+1}^{\ell}\left(W_{\ell+1}^{\top}W_{\ell+1}\right)^{i-L_{1}-1}D_{\ell}\left% (W_{\ell}W_{\ell}^{\top}\right)^{\ell-i}= ( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ä§ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì - italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + ‚àë start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ä§ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_i - italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_D start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ä§ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì - italic_i end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT

Then,

WL:L1+1‚Å¢WL:L1+1‚ä§subscriptùëä:ùêøsubscriptùêø11superscriptsubscriptùëä:ùêøsubscriptùêø11top\displaystyle W_{L:L_{1}+1}W_{L:L_{1}+1}^{\top}italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L : italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L : italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ä§ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT =WL‚Å¢‚ãØ‚Å¢WL1+1‚Å¢WL1+1‚ä§‚Å¢‚ãØ‚Å¢WL‚ä§absentsubscriptùëäùêø‚ãØsubscriptùëäsubscriptùêø11superscriptsubscriptùëäsubscriptùêø11top‚ãØsuperscriptsubscriptùëäùêøtop\displaystyle=W_{L}\cdots W_{L_{1}+1}W_{L_{1}+1}^{\top}\cdots W_{L}^{\top}= italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚ãØ italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ä§ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãØ italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ä§ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT
=WL‚Å¢‚ãØ‚Å¢WL1+2‚Å¢(WL1+2‚ä§‚Å¢WL1+2+EL1+1)‚Å¢WL1+2‚ä§‚Å¢‚ãØ‚Å¢WL‚ä§absentsubscriptùëäùêø‚ãØsubscriptùëäsubscriptùêø12superscriptsubscriptùëäsubscriptùêø12topsubscriptùëäsubscriptùêø12subscriptùê∏subscriptùêø11superscriptsubscriptùëäsubscriptùêø12top‚ãØsuperscriptsubscriptùëäùêøtop\displaystyle=W_{L}\cdots W_{L_{1}+2}\left(W_{L_{1}+2}^{\top}W_{L_{1}+2}+E_{L_% {1}+1}\right)W_{L_{1}+2}^{\top}\cdots W_{L}^{\top}= italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚ãØ italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ä§ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ä§ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãØ italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ä§ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT
=WL‚Å¢‚ãØ‚Å¢WL1+3‚Å¢(WL1+2‚ä§‚Å¢WL1+2)2‚Å¢WL1+3‚ä§‚Å¢‚ãØ‚Å¢WL‚ä§+‚Ñ∞L1+1absentsubscriptùëäùêø‚ãØsubscriptùëäsubscriptùêø13superscriptsuperscriptsubscriptùëäsubscriptùêø12topsubscriptùëäsubscriptùêø122superscriptsubscriptùëäsubscriptùêø13top‚ãØsuperscriptsubscriptùëäùêøtopsubscript‚Ñ∞subscriptùêø11\displaystyle=W_{L}\cdots W_{L_{1}+3}\left(W_{L_{1}+2}^{\top}W_{L_{1}+2}\right% )^{2}W_{L_{1}+3}^{\top}\cdots W_{L}^{\top}+\mathcal{E}_{L_{1}+1}= italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚ãØ italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 3 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ä§ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 3 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ä§ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãØ italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ä§ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + caligraphic_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT
=‚Ä¶absent‚Ä¶\displaystyle=\dots= ‚Ä¶
=(WL‚Å¢WL‚ä§)L2+‚àëi=L1+1L‚àí1‚Ñ∞i,absentsuperscriptsubscriptùëäùêøsuperscriptsubscriptùëäùêøtopsubscriptùêø2superscriptsubscriptùëñsubscriptùêø11ùêø1subscript‚Ñ∞ùëñ\displaystyle=\left(W_{L}W_{L}^{\top}\right)^{L_{2}}+\sum_{i=L_{1}+1}^{L-1}% \mathcal{E}_{i},= ( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ä§ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + ‚àë start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L - 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT caligraphic_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ,

where ‚Ñ∞i=WL‚Å¢‚ãØ‚Å¢Wi+1‚Å¢Ei‚Å¢Wi+1‚ä§‚Å¢‚ãØ‚Å¢WL‚ä§subscript‚Ñ∞ùëñsubscriptùëäùêø‚ãØsubscriptùëäùëñ1subscriptùê∏ùëñsuperscriptsubscriptùëäùëñ1top‚ãØsuperscriptsubscriptùëäùêøtop\mathcal{E}_{i}=W_{L}\cdots W_{i+1}E_{i}W_{i+1}^{\top}\cdots W_{L}^{\top}caligraphic_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT = italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚ãØ italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ä§ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãØ italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ä§ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT. As a result, we have

‚Äñ(WL‚Å¢WL‚ä§)L2‚àíWL:L1+1‚Å¢WL:L1+1‚ä§‚Äño‚Å¢p=‚Äñ‚àëi=L1+1L‚àí1‚Ñ∞i‚Äño‚Å¢p‚â§‚àëi=L1+1L‚àí1‚Äñ‚Ñ∞i‚Äño‚Å¢p.subscriptnormsuperscriptsubscriptùëäùêøsuperscriptsubscriptùëäùêøtopsubscriptùêø2subscriptùëä:ùêøsubscriptùêø11superscriptsubscriptùëä:ùêøsubscriptùêø11topùëúùëùsubscriptnormsuperscriptsubscriptùëñsubscriptùêø11ùêø1subscript‚Ñ∞ùëñùëúùëùsuperscriptsubscriptùëñsubscriptùêø11ùêø1subscriptnormsubscript‚Ñ∞ùëñùëúùëù\left\|\left(W_{L}W_{L}^{\top}\right)^{L_{2}}-W_{L:L_{1}+1}W_{L:L_{1}+1}^{\top% }\right\|_{op}=\left\|\sum_{i=L_{1}+1}^{L-1}\mathcal{E}_{i}\right\|_{op}\leq% \sum_{i=L_{1}+1}^{L-1}\left\|\mathcal{E}_{i}\right\|_{op}.‚à• ( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ä§ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L : italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L : italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ä§ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_o italic_p end_POSTSUBSCRIPT = ‚à• ‚àë start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L - 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT caligraphic_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_o italic_p end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚â§ ‚àë start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L - 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• caligraphic_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_o italic_p end_POSTSUBSCRIPT .

Since ‚ÄñWk‚Äño‚Å¢p‚â§rsubscriptnormsubscriptùëäùëòùëúùëùùëü\|W_{k}\|_{op}\leq r‚à• italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_o italic_p end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚â§ italic_r for all k={L1+1,‚ãØ‚Å¢L}ùëòsubscriptùêø11‚ãØùêøk=\{L_{1}+1,\cdots L\}italic_k = { italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 , ‚ãØ italic_L }, we have ‚ÄñE‚Ñì‚Äño‚Å¢p‚â§(‚Ñì‚àíL1)‚Å¢œµ2‚Å¢r2‚Å¢(‚Ñì‚àíL1‚àí1)subscriptnormsubscriptùê∏‚Ñìùëúùëù‚Ñìsubscriptùêø1subscriptitalic-œµ2superscriptùëü2‚Ñìsubscriptùêø11\|E_{\ell}\|_{op}\leq(\ell-L_{1})\epsilon_{2}r^{2(\ell-L_{1}-1)}‚à• italic_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_o italic_p end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚â§ ( roman_‚Ñì - italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) italic_œµ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_r start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 ( roman_‚Ñì - italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - 1 ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT and ‚Äñ‚Ñ∞‚Ñì‚Äño‚Å¢p‚â§r2‚Å¢(L‚àí‚Ñì)‚Å¢(‚Ñì‚àíL1)‚Å¢œµ2‚Å¢r2‚Å¢(‚Ñì‚àíL1‚àí1)=(‚Ñì‚àíL1)‚Å¢œµ2‚Å¢r2‚Å¢(L2‚àí1).subscriptnormsubscript‚Ñ∞‚Ñìùëúùëùsuperscriptùëü2ùêø‚Ñì‚Ñìsubscriptùêø1subscriptitalic-œµ2superscriptùëü2‚Ñìsubscriptùêø11‚Ñìsubscriptùêø1subscriptitalic-œµ2superscriptùëü2subscriptùêø21\|\mathcal{E}_{\ell}\|_{op}\leq r^{2(L-\ell)}(\ell-L_{1})\epsilon_{2}r^{2(\ell% -L_{1}-1)}=(\ell-L_{1})\epsilon_{2}r^{2(L_{2}-1)}.‚à• caligraphic_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_o italic_p end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚â§ italic_r start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 ( italic_L - roman_‚Ñì ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( roman_‚Ñì - italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) italic_œµ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_r start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 ( roman_‚Ñì - italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - 1 ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT = ( roman_‚Ñì - italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) italic_œµ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_r start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 ( italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - 1 ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT . Thus, we have

‚Äñ(WL‚Å¢WL‚ä§)L2‚àíWL:L1+1‚Å¢WL:L1+1‚ä§‚Äño‚Å¢p‚â§L222‚Å¢œµ2‚Å¢r2‚Å¢(L2‚àí1).subscriptnormsuperscriptsubscriptùëäùêøsuperscriptsubscriptùëäùêøtopsubscriptùêø2subscriptùëä:ùêøsubscriptùêø11superscriptsubscriptùëä:ùêøsubscriptùêø11topùëúùëùsuperscriptsubscriptùêø222subscriptitalic-œµ2superscriptùëü2subscriptùêø21\left\|\left(W_{L}W_{L}^{\top}\right)^{L_{2}}-W_{L:L_{1}+1}W_{L:L_{1}+1}^{\top% }\right\|_{op}\leq\frac{L_{2}^{2}}{2}\epsilon_{2}r^{2(L_{2}-1)}.‚à• ( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ä§ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L : italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L : italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ä§ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_o italic_p end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚â§ divide start_ARG italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG italic_œµ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_r start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 ( italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - 1 ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT .

Report Github Issue
Generated by L A T E xml

Instructions for reporting errors

We are continuing to improve HTML versions of papers, and your feedback helps enhance accessibility and mobile support. To report errors in the HTML that will help us improve conversion and rendering, choose any of the methods listed below:

  • Click the "Report Issue" button.
  • Open a report feedback form via keyboard, use "Ctrl + ?".
  • Make a text selection and click the "Report Issue for Selection" button near your cursor.
  • You can use Alt+Y to toggle on and Alt+Shift+Y to toggle off accessible reporting links at each section.

Our team has already identified the following issues. We appreciate your time reviewing and reporting rendering errors we may not have found yet. Your efforts will help us improve the HTML versions for all readers, because disability should not be a barrier to accessing research. Thank you for your continued support in championing open access for all.

Have a free development cycle? Help support accessibility at arXiv! Our collaborators at LaTeXML maintain a list of packages that need conversion, and welcome developer contributions.
